31a4('bum): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rnam par thard pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mas kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// mthar
31a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i
31a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / snganang pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni
31a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes
31a8('bum): gnyen du rig par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mo zas bcu ni bya
31b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
31b2('bum): du rig par bya'o// mamo yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang
31b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
31b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig pa ra bya'o// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
31b5('bum): rnams kyi stond par rig par bya ste/ pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug ni sam mo/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug na snang ba'o// pha rol tu phyind pa drug ni sgron ma'o//
31b6('bum): sa pa'o// shes rab bo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no// pha rol du tu phyin pa drug ni skyabs so/ pha ro sad tu phyin pa drug ni mgon no// pha ros tu
31b7('bum): phyin pa drug ni ma'o// pha rol tu phyind pa drug ni pa'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni stonod pa car rig par bya ste/ stong pa nyid thams cad ni lam mo/ stong pa nyid thams cad ni snang ba'o/
31b8('bum): stong pa nyid ni sgron ma'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni bri'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes pa'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes rab bo// stong pa nyid thams cad ni dpung gnyen no/
32a1('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad ni skyabs so// stong pa nyid thams cad ni mgon no/ tong pa nyid thams cad ni ma'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni pha'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
32a2('bum): bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stond par rig par bya ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni lam mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag
32a3('bum): ba bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o// shes rab po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// blun pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni ma'o// dz+nyAn pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni pha'o//
32a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stond par rig par skye rtsa ga 'i ji spyongs pa'i rim mthoyang dag par smra
32a5('bum): ba bzhi ni snang ba'o// yang dag par spong pa bzhi ni smon ma'o blo'o shesapa'o/ shes rab po yang dag par spong ba bzhi nidapung gnyen no/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni skya bso
32a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni 'gon no/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni ma'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni pha'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
32a7('bum): rnams kyi nyond par rig par bya ste rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni lam mo rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni smon la'o blo'i zhes pa shes rdzu gyus kyi na la bzhi di nye
32a8('bum): nang pa bzhi ma skyems so// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhin mgon no// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ni ma'o/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ni pha'o// dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
32b1('bum): stonang par rig par bya ste/ dbang po lnga ni lam mo/ dbang po lnga ni snang ba'o// dbang po lnga ni sgron ma'o// zlo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// dbang po lnga ni dpung gnyen no// dbang po
32b2('bum): lnga ni sbubs so// dbang po lnga ni mgon no// dbang po lnga ni ma'o// dbang po lnga ni pa'o// stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya /
32b3('bum): habs la na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa kya ha nad par rag par bas/ stobs lnga ni lam mo/ stobs lnga ni snang ba'o// stobs lnga ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o
32b4('bum): shes rab bo/ stobs lnga ni dpung gnyen no// stobasalnga ni skyabs so// stobs lnga ni mgon no// stobs lnga ni ma'o/ stobs ldan pa'o// byang chub
32b5('bum): kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nyond par rig par bya ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni lam mo// byang chub kyi yan
32b6('bum): lag bdun ni snang ba'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni sgron ma'o// bla'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni dpung gnyen no// byang chub kyi yan lag/
32b7('bum): bdun ni skyabs so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni mgon no// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni ma'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni pha'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
32b8('bum): brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nyond par rig par bya ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni lam mo/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa na
33a1('bum): snang ba'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dpung
33a2('bum): gnyen no// 'phags pa'i sam yan yig brgyad pa ni skyabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan laka brgyad pa ni mgon no// 'phags pa'i sam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma'o/
33a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni pha'o//
33a4('bum): shes bam po gsum pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
33a5('bum): ri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nyond par rig par bya ste/ 'phags pa'i bde na pa rnams ni lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden
33a6('bum): pa rnams ni snang ba'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams na sgron ma'o// blo'o/ shes pa'o// shes rab bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ 'phags
33a7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ni skyabs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mgon no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni pa'o//
33a8('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ bsam gtan rnams ni lam mo/ bsam gtan rnams ni snang ba'o//
33b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni sgron ma'o// the'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo/ bsam gtan rnams ni dpung gnyen no// bsam gtan rnams ni skyabs so// bsam gtan rnas
33b2('bum): ni mgon no// bsam gtan rnams ni ma'o// bsam gtan rnams ni pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stond par rig par bya
33b3('bum): tshad myed pa rnams ni sam mo// tshad myed pa rnams ni snang ba'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo/ tshad myed pa rnams ni dpung gnyen
33b4('bum): tshad myed pa rnams ni skyabs so/ tshad myed pa rnams ni mgon no// tshad myed pa rnams ni ma'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
33b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stond par rig par bya ste/ gzu gas myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni lam mo
33b6('bum): gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snang ba'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// bro'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// gzugs myed
33b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni skyabs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mgon no/
33b8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
34a1('bum): can po rnams kyi ston par rig par byas/ rnam par thard pa brgyad ni sam mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni snang ba'o// rnam par tha dad pa brgyad ni smon ma'o// rnam
34a2('bum): shes pa'o// shes rab bo// rnam par thard pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par thard pa brgyad ni skyabs so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni mgon no// rnam par thard pa brgyad
34a3('bum): ni ma'o// rnam par thar da pa brgyad ni pha'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stond par rig par
34a4('bum): bya ste/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni lam mo/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni snang ba'o// mthar
34a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sgron ma 'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgun
34a6('bum): dpung gnyen no/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni skyabs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku ni mgon no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i
34a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgra ni ma'o// mabar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms por 'jug par mu ni pa'o// nAm par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
34a8('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nyonod par rig par bya'o ste/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni lam
34b1('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni snang ba'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni
34b2('bum): sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par tha rad pa'i
34b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni skyabs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni mgon no// rnam par tha rad par
34b4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni ma'o// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni
34b5('bum): pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig/ bar bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam mo/
34b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni snang ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni smon pa'o// blan shes pa'o// shes rab bo// mngon par shes pa rnams ni zhin no// mngon
34b7('bum): par shes pa rnams ni skyabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mgon no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams
34b8('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nyond par rig par bya'o/ ting nge 'dzind nams ni lam mo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snang ba'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams
35a1('bum): ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni dpung gnyen no// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni skyabs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni mgon
35a2('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams ni ma'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni pha'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stond par rig par bya ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnas
35a3('bum): ni lam mo/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snang ba'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab po/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzungs
35a4('bum): kyi sgo rnams ni skyabs so/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mgon no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma'o// zungs kyi sgo rnams ni pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
35a5('bum): 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stond par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
35a6('bum): stobs bcu ni snang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sgron ma'o// zlo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dpung gnyen no//
35a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni skyabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mgon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
35a8('bum): btsun pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni
35b1('bum): snang ba'o// kyi 'jigs pa bzhini sgron ma'o/ za'o/ shes pa'o/ shes rab / myi 'jigs pa bzhini dpung gnyen no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni skyabs so// myi 'jigs
35b2('bum): pa bzhi ni mgon no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par
35b3('bum): rig par bya ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni lam mo/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// bre'o// shes pa'o// shes rab
35b4('bum): bo so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni skyabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni mgon no// so so yang dag par
35b5('bum): rig pa bzhi ni ma'o/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pha'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rton par
35b6('bum): rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni lam mo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sgron ma'o// 'i shes
35b7('bum): shes rab po sangs rgyas kyi'i dres pa bco brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni skyabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mgon no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
35b8('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni pha'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/
36a1('bum): las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snang ba'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes
36a2('bum): pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pha'o// rnam
36a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cum bdu na po 'di dag ni 'das
36a4('bum): pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang ya pa dang yum du
36a5('bum): gyur to/ rab 'byor da byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
36a6('bum): gang ji snyed cing 'thung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rang bdun po 'di dag ni/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
36a7('bum): khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang ya ba dang yum du gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di
36a8('bum): ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dngang ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ rab 'byor dede bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla ra myed pa yang dag par
36b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya bar 'dod pas bsdu ba'i dngos
36b2('bum): po bzhis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyand pa dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pa'o he// rab 'byor da ngas don gyi dbang
36b3('bum): de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nyond pa dang / ma dang pha' dang / dpung gnyen
36b4('bum): dang / skyabs dang / mgon yin no zhes brjod do// rab 'byor da de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
36b5('bum): gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog par gnas par 'dod pa dang / mas can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
36b6('bum): sems can yongs su sbyind par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi phar yang tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
36b7('bum): gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rgya cher bstanang to// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid
36b8('bum): lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa yad pa/ rab 'byor de nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
37a1('bum): byin pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab
37a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bcal pa/ rab 'byor da de
37a3('bum): de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos
37a4('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos tham sa cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o// chos tham sa cad ni chos thams cad kyis tong ba'o// rab 'byor
37a5('bum): rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid
37a6('bum): des chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis
37a7('bum): stong na sems can rnams kyi sand nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das yin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ rnam par byang/
37a8('bum): bar gyi 'gyur / stongs nyid ni mun nam nyon mongs par gyi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar gyi 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni thar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa
37b1('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya/ dben pas ni nyos nyid sa chos gang yang myi dmyigs/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta
37b2('bum): bu myi dmyigs na bcom ldan 'das bstand pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba ya pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
37b3('bum): sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la gyor dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so
37b4('bum): bdag dub kyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi bas sems can na mas kund tu rgyug cing / kun tu 'khor bar gyur to bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bcal pa rab 'byor
37b5('bum): de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yo/ da pa yin te/ gang la bdag tu bya ba myed pa dang / dag gir bya ba myed pa de la 'dzin pa myed/ gang la
37b6('bum): 'dzind pa myed pa de la sems can kund tu rgyug cing / kund tu 'khor ba myed de/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang myed pas 'a byo'ide ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba
37b7('bum): yod pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la myi spyod/ tshor ba la myi spyod/ 'du shes la
37b8('bum): kyi spyod pa'adu byed la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la myi spyod do// myigs myi spyod/ rna bas myi spyod/ sAl gyi spyod/ spe la myi spyod/ lus la myi spyod/ yid la myi spyod/
38a1('bum): gzugs sa kyi spong skas kyi spyod/ dris kyi spyod/ rol gyi spyod/ rags kyi spyod chos la gyi spyod do// myig kyi rnam par shes pa sa myi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam
38a2('bum): par shes pa la myi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa sa myi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod do// myig
38a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod
38a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi spyod
38a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ lu sa kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/
38a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myi spyod do// sa'i khams la myi spyod/ chu'i khams la myi spyod/ mye'i khams la myi spyod/ rlung gi khams la myi spyod/ nam mkha
38a7('bum): khams sa kyi spyod rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi spyod do// ma rig pas kyi spyod/ 'du byed la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la gyi spyod/ mying dang gzugs pa gyi spyod/ skye mched
38a8('bum): sakyi spyod/ ris pas kyi spyod/ tshor bas kyi myong / med pas kyi myod sen po sa kyi spong // ming pas gyi spong / skye ba la gyi spyod/ gnyis kyi spong ngo // sbyi zil po
38b1('bum): tu phyind pa la myi spyod tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
38b2('bum): tu phyind pa la myi spyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la skye
38b3('bum): spyod chen po stong pa nyid la myi spyod don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi
38b4('bum): pyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi gyod dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi spyod /
38b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dngos po myed
38b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi spyod/ dbang po rnams la
38b7('bum): gyi spyod/ stobs rnams la myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gyi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi spyod/ bsam gtan
38b8('bum): rnams la gyi spyod/ chad myed pa rnams la myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gyi spyod/ rnam par thard pa brgyad la myi spyod/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
39a1('bum): 'jug pa dgu la myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sto stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la
39a2('bum): myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la myi spyod/ byams pa chen po la
39a3('bum): myi spyod/ snying rje chen po la myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la myi spyod/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la myi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la myi spyod/
39a4('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la myi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la myi spyod/ rang byang chub la myi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa she/ sa pa nyid la myi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
39a5('bum): nyid la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ra gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyodapar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad myi dmyigs so//
39a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa 'i 'jig rten gyis myi thub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de
39a7('bum): ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zild kyis gnon par myi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di
39a8('bum): lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil kyis kyi nor pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad
39b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni thild kyis myi non pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
39b2('bum): pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'dzajam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed pa kyo rjes thob par
39b3('bum): gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
39b4('bum): mo la la zhig gis/ rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas// phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
39b5('bum): bsngos na rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rig sa kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus ma du 'phel lam/ gso sad pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo
39b6('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lang pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan pa
39b7('bum): stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'gres pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par nyon
39b8('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi
40a1('bum): khams kyi sems can kang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
40a2('bum): sangs rgyas par gyur pa la de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas bkur bahi byas phu dud byas/ mchod
40a3('bum): ba byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
40a4('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcomaldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa rab 'byor da de
40a5('bum): bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la hond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang
40a6('bum): 'akresad pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na de'i bsod
40a7('bum): rnams ches yang du 'phel lo/ rab 'byor dgas te hong gi 'jig chend kyi khams kyi sems can gapa'i snyed pa de dag thams cad lnga phyi myed par bya'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag
40a8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur da la de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas
40b1('bum): bu drung byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de'i snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
40b2('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de bas
40b3('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed
40b4('bum): pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa da nga shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed/ pas rnam par spyod na de'i bsod nams ches mang du
40b5('bum): 'phes lo// rab 'byor gal te hong gnyis kyi 'ji ga rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na myed
40b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rim gror byas
40b7('bum): bkur sti byas pu dud byas mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ rigs
40b8('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
41a1('bum): rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog
41a2('bum): pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spyod na
41a3('bum): de'i bsod nams ces mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor dgal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenang gi khams kyi sems cadag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur
41a4('bum): te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mdo nad par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur da la/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu'am
41a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ kur sti byas/ phu dud byas mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i cha ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
41a6('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang
41a7('bum): ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la
41a8('bum): stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / shes
41b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spyod na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor dgal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de
41b2('bum): dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur da la de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi
41b3('bum): la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang
41b4('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / ragra
41b5('bum): bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs/ pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla
41b6('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
41b7('bum): gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
41b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la stond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed
42a1('bum): pa dang / yang dag par stonang na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa
42a2('bum): de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyu rad sa/ de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan
42a3('bum): bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /
42a4('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra
42a5('bum): bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la/ rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
42a6('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa
42a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
42a8('bum): tu phyi nad pa 'di gzhan la btond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang
42b1('bum): dag par stond na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor dkal te stong gya hang chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i
42b2('bum): lus thob par gyur da la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa
42b3('bum): bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod
42b4('bum): pa dang / yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bka/ da pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /
42b5('bum): rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba/ 'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
42b6('bum): tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang
42b7('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la
42b8('bum): stond cing / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'greld pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na de'i bsod
43a1('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor nga gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par
43a2('bum): gyur pa la/ de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rab
43a3('bum): bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngond par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang
43a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sa rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub
43a5('bum): la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rta/ gas pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
43a6('bum): tu yongs su smos na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol dbya/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
43a7('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba ya pa/ rab 'byor de de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang 'chad
43a8('bum): pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang
43b1('bum): du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur pa la/ de dag rigs kyi
43b2('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i sas kyi sems rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhis rab tu bkod dang / tshad myed pa ba'i la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i
43b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sa rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
43b4('bum): rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang
43b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du seMs
43b6('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
43b7('bum): bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di gzhan la nyond pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu
43b8('bum): gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par stond na na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de de ltar
44a1('bum): gyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par 'byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas
44a2('bum): 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
44a3('bum): rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang la yang myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par
44a4('bum): sgrub te/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la smra da pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad gsad par 'gyur ba dang / 'dra bar lta ste/ de dag snying rje chen po 'thob pa
44a5('bum): de dag rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pas dka' bas ra/ ba tu dka' ba dang / mngon par dga' ba dang / de dag dka' ba chen po mngon par sgrub po/ de dag mtshan ma
44a6('bum): de dang lhand cig tu myi gnas te/ de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob po/ rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha
44a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i snang ba'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i snang ba'o// bsam gtan
44a8('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i snang ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang sems can
44b1('bum): thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog go// de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par spyod
44b2('bum): pa'i phyir su'i gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang / sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad
44b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid da rtse bar gyur to// rab 'byor de de bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyad par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams
44b4('bum): cad kyi lam pa hand par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen po 'bru nga bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi btson ra na gnasapa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /
44b5('bum): sems can thams cad kyi bla na myed pa'i shes rab kyi myig bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par
44b6('bum): gnas par bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par myi spyod na yang des yid la bya ba gzhanang gi go
44b7('bum): skabs myi dbye ste/ des ni nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis/ nyin mtshan du myi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste
44b8('bum): dper na sngan cad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la/ des dus gzhan zhig na/ nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/ des nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas/ dga' ba dang / spro ba dang /
45a1('bum): yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag du stor par gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug bsngal dang / yid myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag
45a2('bum): tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyu rang to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyu nad tu 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin
45a3('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / ma bral bas bya'o// rnam pa thos
45a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang myi bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang po dang lnga na par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
45a5('bum): 'das yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub seMs
45a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid sa bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' myi dmyigs yid la bgyi ba myi dmyig
45a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dgal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad
45a8('bum): ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /
45b1('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni
45b2('bum): gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar shes
45b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa he/ de la 'phel ba myed do// yongs su 'grib pa myed do// gsos dpa bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab
45b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing / rang ba zhin gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
45b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par 'byung zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog/ sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
45b6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba 'am/ yongs su 'grib pa myed do// de ba'in
45b7('bum): nyid la 'phel ba 'am/ yongs su 'grib pa myed do// chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba'am/ yongs su 'grib pa myed do// yangabadag pa'i mtha' la 'phel ba'am/ yongs su 'grib
45b8('bum): ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la ni gcig kyang ma yin/ gnyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor da gal te de skad du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa'
46a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'dzum myi 'god/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa
46a2('bum): ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o//
46a3('bum): bam po ban rab 'byor kyis gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das zhes
46a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
46a5('bum): phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na kang shes
46a6('bum): rab kyi pha ro song tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmyigs su mchis sas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dab/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// gsomang pa/ bcom ldan 'das
46a7('bum): ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol da ba
46b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
46b2('bum): stong pa nyid las gud du stong pa nyid spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dade de ni ma yin no gsoso pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu
46b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
46b4('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed she sa rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol
46b5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dade de ni ma yin no// rab 'byo rad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
46b6('bum): myig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sna shes rab kyi pha
46b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
46b8('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor dkyis
47a1('bum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags/ sku shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa
47a2('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
47a3('bum): 'das ci lags reg shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
47a4('bum): sus pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab byod kyis gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das ni lags myig gi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
47a5('bum): sa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lagasaba'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i rnam
47a6('bum): par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam sa ldan na kyis/ skye ni she she kyis tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci logs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol
47a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
47a8('bum): rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
47b1('bum): 'das ci lags rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam
47b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
47b3('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni
47b4('bum): ma yin no// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ brtsam ldan 'das ci lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa la sa byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
47b5('bum): dam bcom ldan 'das ci lags rna ba'i 'du sa te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
47b6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
47b7('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi 'dus te reg
47b8('bum): ba las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
48a1('bum): ci lags/ sa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chu'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
48a2('bum): 'das ci lags/ mye'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rlung gi khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci
48a3('bum): lags nam mkha'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
48a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin norab 'byor kyi gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
48a5('bum): 'das ci lags 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam pa ra shes pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam
48a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags mying dang gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye mched drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
48a7('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'apyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
48a8('bum): sred pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lend pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ srid pa shes rab kyi
48b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rga shi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
48b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi ga stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor dkyis gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam
48b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol
48b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
48b5('bum): bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48b6('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi la/ yul pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor dkyis kaso yod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48b7('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyi stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// phyin stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod
48b8('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chen po stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
49a1('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags don dam pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab
49a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus byas tong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mtha' las 'das pa
49a3('bum): stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa tong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
49a4('bum): dor ba myed pa tong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa/ spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang bzhin no// nga pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam
49a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags chos thams cad stong pa nyid da shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom lda na 'das ci lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes
49a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po myed pa
49a7('bum): stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po myed
49a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
49b1('bum): ci lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
49b2('bum): ci lags rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
49b3('bum): stobs lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags pa'i
49b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyo/ da dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam
49b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bsam gtan bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyilags/ tshad myed pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
49b6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thard pa brgyad shes rab
49b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam
49b8('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol
50a1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ting nge 'dzind rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
50a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ myi 'jigs
50a3('bum): pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ snying rje chen
50a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom lda na 'das ci lakas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa co brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam//
50a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom lda na 'das ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes
50a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid shes
50a7('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab
50a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyerd pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
50b1('bum): 'am sa dam/ byung dag pa rnams com ldan 'das kyisags/ gzugs kyi slongs da dang / sog nyid dang / bapa nyid dang / sum pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang

50b6('bum): 'das ci lags/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan
50b7('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon byed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi
50b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de
51a1('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang
51a2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
51a3('bum): dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi
51a4('bum): dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon// myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyi/ sa myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
51a5('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsolapa bcom ldan 'das ci lags myig gi stong pa nyid dang
51a6('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang
51a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon byed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
51a8('bum): ldan 'das mi lags/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / sa nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
51b1('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol

51b4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sle stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang /
51b5('bum): rag sus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma mi/ na ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings

54b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang de bzhin/
