54b4('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi sa nyid po skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam
54b5('bum): kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsobo nyid dang / rag sus pa nyid dang /
54b6('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang /
54b7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no//
54b8('bum): rab 'byor kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying
55a1('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos
55a2('bum): skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
55a3('bum): kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
55a4('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa 'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
55a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa ci lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang /
55a6('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid
55a7('bum): dang / chos sgron myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
55a8('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag sum pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
55b1('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
55b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma
55b3('bum): nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi
55b4('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang /
55b5('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag sus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mas pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
55b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan
55b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor dkyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsobo nyid dang rag
55b8('bum): lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
56a1('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chu'i khams kyi
56a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos
56a3('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spod dam/
56a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mye'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyi da dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang
56a5('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de da chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang
56a6('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag lus pa
56a7('bum): nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor po de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyon
56a8('bum): myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid
56b1('bum): dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang
56b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
56b3('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
56b4('bum): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam
56b5('bum): kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor da kyis
56b6('bum): gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang
56b7('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
56b8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang rag lus
57a1('bum): pa nyid dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas
57a2('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags
57a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa
57a4('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag/ pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
57a5('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mying dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis
57a6('bum): bya nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed
57a7('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid dang /
57a8('bum): gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos
57b1('bum): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
57b2('bum): 'das ci lags/ reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
57b3('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol
57b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de
57b5('bum): bzhin nyid dang mad de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de ba zhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag
57b6('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sred pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag
57b7('bum): lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
57b8('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lend pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
58a1('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chas nyi
58a2('bum): dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
58a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ srid pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang no de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
58a4('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha
58a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci sogs skye ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid da nga rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang de bzhi
58a6('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnang nyid po rkyen myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de
58a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rga shi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / raka sus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /
58a8('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chas ka dbyangs dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang yang dag par
58b1('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor dkyis gsol da pa/
58b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ sbyin pa'i pha so tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma dor ba de bzhin
58b3('bum): nyid dang / gzhanam sed pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dkyis
58b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod dam/ bcom na 'das kyi lags/ rgyas khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinastong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gamapa nyid dpas
58b5('bum): gus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchos pa nyid dang / de zan na nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang
58b6('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
58b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
58b8('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha
59a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci sogs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
59a2('bum): glang po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos ston rgya
59a3('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa
59a4('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lu sa pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin / da dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
59a5('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yabadag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings
59a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag sum pa nyid dang snying
59a7('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa
59a8('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor don ma yin
59b1('bum): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / kasog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /
59b2('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
59b3('bum): mtha' dang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag
59b4('bum): lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhi na nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin/ pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang /
59b5('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / ba dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
59b6('bum): 'das mi lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang
59b7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
59b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /
60a1('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / kazhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon byed pa nyid dang / yang da/
60a2('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dpyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang rag
60a3('bum): lus pa nyid dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang no pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa
60a4('bum): nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong
60a5('bum): pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag su/ sa pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyi da dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa
60a6('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol
60a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /
60a8('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chom nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
60b1('bum): dang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid
60b2('bum): dang rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gan
60b3('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mtha'
60b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog/ nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snyi nga po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba
60b5('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
60b6('bum): dang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang /
60b7('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
60b8('bum): dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lags
61a1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag sum pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang

66a8('bum): ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de/ na nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang
66b1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang /
66b2('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos
66b3('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam pa thams
66b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchi/ sa pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
66b5('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mya
66b6('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kas
66b7('bum): te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom
66b8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i chos da khyod kyis mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni
67a1('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas da pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
67a2('bum): tu phyind pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis ma
67a3('bum): mthong ba'i chos de dmyigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang dmyigs
67a4('bum): su myed pa de skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gso/ lad pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dade de ni byang chub
67a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myi skye ba'i tshe sa la bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na sings
67a6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis blan byed pa sa par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand te/ rab 'byor 'di ni stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / ma so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
67a7('bum): ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod de ltar tshol/ de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa
67a8('bum): shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par myi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des myi skye ba'i
67b1('bum): sa mazod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni zan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
67b2('bum): kyis gsosang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad kyi myi skye ba'i nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
67b3('bum): lung bstand par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baN+Dal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba yang ma lags/ myi skye ba yang ma lags pa
67b4('bum): las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas dpa/ rab 'byor de ni ma
67b5('bum): yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba yang ma lags/ myi skye ba yang ma lags pa las kyang / byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par
67b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung myi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
67b7('bum): pa rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
67b8('bum): de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
68a1('bum): chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag
68a2('bum): par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
68a3('bum): ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar myi sems so// / de ci'i
68a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ 'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad myed pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
68a5('bum): na rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam par myi rtog pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu drug go/
68a6('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das zhes
68a7('bum): rab kyi pha roso tu phyin pa ni ga nidang tu dben pa'i slad du ba dga' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha 'os tu phyind pa ni gos tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dga' ba'o/ bcom ldan 'dasashes rab kyi
68b1('bum): rom tu phyi nang pa ni ni nang tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu byi nad pa ni shinang tu dben pa'i slad du rtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
68b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa ni shin tu dben pa'i mad cu'i 'phra ba'ib pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gas rab kyi pha ros tu phyid pa ni gi ning tu dben pa'i slad du ma khas shing / rig pa sa rtogs par bkya
68b3('bum): na 'damams panas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzind pa dang / 'chang zhing / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing / bla na myed pa yang nga/
68b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan kyai go myi 'byed pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa
68b5('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyan cing /
68b6('bum): 'dzind pa dang 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang
68b7('bum): sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mya 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i cha ba tha ma dang ldan pa yin no// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
68b8('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyurapa/ chad myed pa bzhi dang ldan par gyurd/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur / mngon par
69a1('bum): shes pa snga dang ldan par gyur da la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/ bzung
69a2('bum): 'ang bcangs te/ grags shing rngub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ ke'u shig dge ba'i rang ba 'di la sA la'i dge ba'i ma pa des brgya'i char yang nye bar gyi 'grol/ stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'dris
69a3('bum): brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'grol
69a4('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag hong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gre'o// grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// de nas dge slong gcig cig gis/ lha'i dbang po
69a5('bum): brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka 'jam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa
69a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi g.yeng ba'i sems
69a7('bum): kyis 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
69a8('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi ko mya'i byed pa de dag zil gyis nonod to// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras
69b1('bum): dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling kyi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa
69b2('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/ gang
69b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rdul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ klags shing kun chub par
69b4('bum): byas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha dang mI dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyis non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
69b5('bum): chen po des ni/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa na 'jig rtend zil gis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang myi dang
69b6('bum): ska ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil ki me mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
69b7('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zis kyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyu rang tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi
69b8('bum): 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
70a1('bum): pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnond cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par
70a2('bum): yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol
70a3('bum): tu phyind pa dang bral ba de dag zil gyis gnond cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'
70a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil kyis gnon cing
70a5('bum): 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ra yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson
70a6('bum): grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa dang bral ba kanga'i sted pa de dag kyang thos kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
70a7('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang /
70a8('bum): bral ba shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dang bral pa kanga'i snyed pa de dag kyang zis kyis gnon pa'i 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems
70b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ji skad du bstand pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnan par myi nus so// byang
70b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ji skad du bstand pa dang / 'thund par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems
70b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rigs rgyu nad myi gcad pa'i don tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du myi
70b4('bum): byed pa'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang / phang ba ra myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
70b5('bum): chen po de ni sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa / 'a chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i slab pa la slob pa ste/
70b6('bum): nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kya
70b7('bum): 'gro bar bya bar sems te/ nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o// kye skyes bu chen po myur tu bslobs shig/ skyes bu che nang po skye nad par slobs shig/ lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying
70b8('bum): po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ blang bar bya ste/ 'di dag ni sngon ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
71a1('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing stond to// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po
71a2('bum): bzhi dag kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lhan cig 'dong bar sems so// de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab
71a3('bum): mtshe ma yang mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhand cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'
71a4('bum): yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhand cig 'gro bar sem sa so// lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang / byed gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so
71a5('bum): tshangs pa myi mched gi bdag po yang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnam sa dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// dge rgyas kyi
71a6('bum): sgra rnams kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so// 'bras bu tsha ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// myi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang
71a7('bum): bar 'dong bar sems so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod bar sems so// gnas gtsang ma'i mi kyi zhes kyang
71a8('bum): bar 'dong par sems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/
71b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung
71b2('bum): ba de dag kyang / thams cad du thams cad lus la gyi 'byung myikyi 'bab ste/ dge slong de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe// tshe 'di
71b3('bum): yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams kang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ byig gi 'ad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ snga'i nad dam/ sde'i nang ngam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nadaka ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
71b4('bum): kyang sus la myi 'byung myi 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig
71b5('bum): par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo 'di snyam du gyu rang te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sond cing / shes rab kyi pha
71b6('bum): rold tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa rjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs
71b7('bum): su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang / legs pa rjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig
71b8('bum): par bya'o/ da po dad kyis tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo re re bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang
72a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rosad tu phyind pa 'di'i yon tan dang / legs pa rjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so// dga' bo gang gi tshe/ byang chub ses
72a2('bum): dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi
72a3('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na bdud sdig to can kang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i
72a4('bum): 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyi ra myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang bya/ nga chub thob par 'gyur ram// 'o nad te ma yin gis bla
72a5('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba snyam ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub
72a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyu ra pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus thug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mas
72a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems cig
72a8('bum): tsam 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bum par 'gyur ba dang / sru g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma srung ba gtong 'i nga 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' ze/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to//
72b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can/ gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
72b2('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// dga' bos gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar
72b3('bum): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gi mtha' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di paha nad pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas
72b4('bum): pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'o// ngo // dka' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems da shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha
72b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the rtse ma du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bas ma pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang
72b6('bum): chub sems dpa' ba/ 'i bshes gnyen dang bras na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi thos so// ma thos pas myi shes so// shes rab
72b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan gyi byed de/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis grags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo
72b8('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzind pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can
73a1('bum): kyis grags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dka' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa rjod na/ de la bdud sdig
73a2('bum): to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni/ bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang
73a3('bum): po'i nang nas/ bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig ru gnas par 'gyur ba ni/
73a4('bum): bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gis glags rnyed par 'gyur to// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
73a5('bum): ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab
73a6('bum): ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci rig bya/ bsgoms pa dang / 'azung ba dang / grags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i kati
73a7('bum): ma rnyedang/ khyod kyis ka rnyed re snyan zhes zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis gags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dka' bo ga'ang yang gang gi che/ byang chub ma
73a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa skyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bzod
73b1('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyad pa'o// ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o//
73b2('bum): khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ khyod ni
73b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// zhes
73b4('bum): rlom sems su byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog du rlom
73b5('bum): sems skyed na dga' bo de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dka' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
73b6('bum): de la yang bdud sdig to can gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i mying brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de mying brjod
73b7('bum): ba'am/ rus rjod pa res/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag byang du gsod cing bdag stod/ gzhan spongs/ phyir gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
73b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la myed par/ rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing bdag
74a1('bum): stong gzhan spod de 'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
74a2('bum): sa gnas par myi snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par myi snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la myi snyand par rjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig/
74a3('bum): to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stong par myi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang shin
74a4('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dang lade byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo
74a5('bum): mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya b.ras mas te/ de la de dag gis thos sam/ mthong na 'thun pan spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong na
74a6('bum): 'thun par spyod cing / de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin nyid du slob pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid du slob cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/
74a7('bum): de ltar de dag phyi nad cig// tu gyu rad pas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis las gang dang gang ba tshams pa de thams cad myi 'dod pa dang / myi sdug pa dang / yid du myi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar
74a8('bum): na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud gi gnas
74b1('bum): kyang shi nang tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dka' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang kal
74b2('bum): te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs
74b3('bum): kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba yin no// de'i phyir 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / phod pa dang / 'chang 'dru ba
74b4('bum): 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/ de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/ de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo
74b5('bum): de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i lam ma yin no// snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gangazag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byung
74b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing / cod la 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ring du byed pa'o// /
74b7('bum): 'di gnyis ka yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang ba rtsams pa de ni/ rnam pa zas
74b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sam brtsams so zhes nas// dga' zhing spro ba
75a1('bum): dang tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstand pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstand pa la gnod par sems
75a2('bum): shing / 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing 'chang 'dru na/ gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su myi gtang zhe na/ ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang 'thab cing chod pa dang
75a3('bum): 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi skald par go ca bgo bar bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/ 'on te
75a4('bum): ma lags kyis/ skal pa de snyed kho nar ko tsa bgo 'tshal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi thag
75a5('bum): pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnam sa ya ngas 'byung ba dang / bcas pa'i chos bstand te/ dag 'bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub
75a6('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang / 'thab cing mod la gshe zhing myi snyan du rjod pa dang / 'thabs shing phod de/ gage ba dang / myi snyand par brjod pa byas nas/ phyir myi 'chags par 'dud
75a7('bum): par 'dzind cing / 'khond tu bzung ste/ gnas na dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar ngagyi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su myi gtang zhe na/ gdon myi za bar bskum
75a8('bum): pa de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o// dka' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing chod de/ gshe ba dang / myi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang mdud par myi 'dzin ta/ phyir
75b1('bum): cad sdom pa 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smras pa la/ phyir smra ba dang / bdag
75b2('bum): gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyu rad par bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag gzhan la myi snyand par smra zhing / phyir zlogs pa ni myi tshul gyis/ bdag gis de ltar myi bya'i/ bdag gis glen pa
75b3('bum): dang sdug pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa myed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
75b4('bum): rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las blta bar bya dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid sa bdag 'jug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag
75b5('bum): la gnod sems su myi bya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'bru ka par myi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de
75b6('bum): sa ni bdud sdig to can grags su 'ang / glags tshol bas kyang grags kyi rnyed do// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ka b+ha ka nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang
75b7('bum): 'grogs par gyi bya'o// de dag dang lhan cig du gnas par myi bya'o// 'dug par gyi bya'o// gal te 'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su myi bya'o// 'jug par gyi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
75b8('bum): gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag sa myi tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
76a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su gros par bya ba dag ko snyam du bya'o// dga' bos gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
76a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dka' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na ston
76a3('bum): pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa'i de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs
76a4('bum): te/ gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o// 'dis ji ltar bsla ba par bya ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
76a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / mes rab kyi pha
76a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas s+ho/
76a7('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
76a8('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
76b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dpa yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
76b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
76b3('bum): mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams
76b4('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so/ yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying
76b5('bum): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya ra dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes/ pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang la slab/
76b6('bum): par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis/ kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston
76b7('bum): pa ste/ gas te 'dres par spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid sa bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis bslab par skye bya'i// gal te byang chub sems dpa
76b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gi bya ni bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i
77a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no//
77a2('bum): bam po drug pa / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
77a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
77a4('bum): rab 'byor de nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
77a5('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems
77a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dacer po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni
77a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor nga 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor/
77a8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
77b1('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
77b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de chos thams cad stong pa nyid
77b3('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dmyi
77b4('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor nga dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
77b5('bum): chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor da ngo bo nyidastong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam sa kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa'i ngo'o
77b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis spong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni 'du
77b7('bum): byed kyis spyong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong/ myig ni myig gis stong / nu ba ni na pas stong / sna ni sngas stong / lce ni sres stong / sus ni lus kyis stong / yid ni yid kyis sa
77b8('bum): gzugs ni gzugs kyis hong / sgra ni smras stong / tri ni dras stong / ro na ros stong / reg ni rag gis stong / chos ni chos kyis stong // myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pas stong
78a1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas hong / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong / lus
78a2('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong // myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus
78a3('bum): te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi
78a4('bum): 'dus te reg pas stong/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
78a5('bum): rkyen kyis tshor bas tong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sa stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i
78a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus
78a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong
78a8('bum): chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis spong mye'i khams ni mye'i khams kyis stong / rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong / nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong / rnam par
78b1('bum): shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong / ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis sto/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / mying dang gzugs ni
78b2('bum): mying dang gzugs kyis spyod/ skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong / reg pa ni rig pas spyong / tshor ba ni yor bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas spyong / sen pa ni len pas tshang / sred pa ni
78b3('bum): srid pa stong / skye ba ni skye bas stong / rga shi na rga shis stong // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi
78b4('bum): pha rold tu phyind pas stong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / brtson la/ grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
78b5('bum): tu phyi nad pas stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pani bas ma gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pas stong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong // nang stong pa nyid na
78b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong kyi dang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong
78b7('bum): pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyim / dor dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus
78b8('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gong/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dang ga la myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis song
79a1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ chos thams cad tong
79a2('bum): pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po
79a3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong // dran pa nye ba
79a4('bum): gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnam sa kyis stong / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul
79a5('bum): gi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni dbang po rna mas kyis stong / stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan
79a6('bum): lag nam smra slong/ sa ma ni lam gyis stong / 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis song/ tshad myed pa
79a7('bum): rnams ni cid myed pa rnams kyis stong / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis spong / rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa
79a8('bum): rnams kyis hong / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
79b1('bum): dang smond pa myed pa ni/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas stong / mngond par shes pa rnams ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting nge 'dzind
79b2('bum): rnams ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong / myi 'jig
79b3('bum): pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong / maso yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ ma so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong // snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
79b4('bum): pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis spyong / rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bun/ spyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i thas
79b5('bum): bu ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir rgyu 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong / rang
79b6('bum): byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis hong / lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis hong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis stong ste/
79b7('bum): rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
79b8('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
80a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar gyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi
80a2('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par
80a3('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
80a4('bum): tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
80a5('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
80a6('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du
80a7('bum): shes kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags
80a8('bum): sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mabyed pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'gag par bkye ba'i slad du slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
80b1('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
80b2('bum): bar mkhye nang pa nyid du slob pa lags som/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par
80b3('bum): pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
80b4('bum): lags sam/ myig bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi ka 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
80b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig myi skye bar
80b6('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sas/ rna ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'dod chag
80b7('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba zhag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
80b8('bum): rab kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam sngabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
80b9('bum): nam sam sde 'dod chags dang bral gyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad ma phyird pa nyid du rma
81a1('bum): lags sam/ sna 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
81a2('bum): ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
81a3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
81a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lu sa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lus 'dod chags dang bras
81a5('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par bgyi ba 'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
81a6('bum): ba lags sam/ lus myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
81a7('bum): ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bkye ba'i slad du slob la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
81a8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
81b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag
81b2('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
81b3('bum): smrabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ smra 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
81b4('bum): lags sam/ sgra 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
81b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri bas par brgya ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slo ba ba lags sam/ dri'i 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi bar
81b6('bum): srang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ji 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ni myi skye bar bgyi
81b7('bum): ba'i slad du srog// rnam pa thams cad ma bye pa nyid du thos pa lags sas/ bas par 'akru ba'i srang du 'ang/ rnam pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dod cags
81b8('bum): dang bral bar 'gyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
82a1('bum): ro myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
82a2('bum): pa lags sam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
82a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thos
82a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'dod chag/ sa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'gag par
82a5('bum): 'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa chos kyi skye bar gyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam myig gau rnam par shes pa bas
82a6('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
82a7('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad
82a8('bum): du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa sogs sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags
82a9('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes paci'adod chags pabral bar 'gyi ba'i slad du slob marnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa logs sa
82b1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par 'gyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ na ba'i rnam pa rags pa kyi skye bar byagyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams ca
82b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du rlob pa lags las/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags
82b3('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
82b4('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myi skye ba'i bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bas
82b5('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sde'i rnam par shes pa'adod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
82b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam
82b7('bum): par shes pa gyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob da/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sus kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du thob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyed
82b8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes
83a1('bum): pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
83a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chag
83a3('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
83a4('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa
83a5('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te re ga pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
83a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyag gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus
83a7('bum): te reg pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
83a8('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag
83b1('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
83b2('bum): lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du
83b3('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam snga'i
83b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam dpa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sas 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
83b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
83b6('bum): slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i
83b7('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags
83b8('bum): sam/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par
85a1('bum): kyis tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
85a2('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
85a3('bum): slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
85a4('bum): tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i srid du slob na/ rnam pa thams cod mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
85a5('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa zas
85a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// sa'i khams
85a7('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i 'ams 'did chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du spyo na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
85a8('bum): dum sa pa lags sam/ ma'i khams 'gag par gyi ba'i med slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
85b1('bum): ra N+DI ba'i slangad nu slog+sa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du thob pa lags sa
85b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chu'i khams pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chu'i khams 'dod chags dang
85b3('bum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chu'i khams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
