85b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams 'gag par
85b8('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nam
85b9('bum): mkha'i khams pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
86a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khas
86a2('bum): gyi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so

90b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang

90b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin gtong pa nyid myi skye bar
91a1('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa

91a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
91a5('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgo ba ba lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'gag/ par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
91a6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi
91a7('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
91a8('bum): pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa hong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sobs/ rnam pa thams cad lakhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du
91b1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myong
91b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
91b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pas
91b4('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du srab pa lags sam/ ngo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chag sa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
91b5('bum): cang ma khyerang ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ zam cir s+ho/ pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams ngamakhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam dza ma nyid stong pa
91b6('bum): dkyi skye kyiba'i ba du thob na/ rnam pa thams par ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos pa skyed pam than pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i srang du slob / rnam pa thams cad
91b7('bum): mkhyem pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngom po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid snang ba nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du thob / rnam pa thams cad pa khyed pa nyid du slob pa sags sas/ sa
91b8('bum): bskyod pa'i 'i cid dang sa nyid par bgyi pa'i ming du thob / rnam pa thams pa khyen pa nyid du thob pa sugs sa byeng pa di so lnga par 'i gyi ba'i srang du thob ra
91b9('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags som dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
94a1('bum): srad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
94a2('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo
94a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
94a4('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/ rabagyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar po'i ske stong
94a5('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'ag/ ga par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong
94a6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i

94a8('bum): lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du
94b1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slong du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin
94b2('bum): rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
94b3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
94b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ zungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
94b5('bum): lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bgyi ba 'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi skye ba
94b6('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcubs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
94b7('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// de bzhin gshen
94b8('bum): pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sra bo na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tha
97a1('bum): cang ma khye rang pa nyid du thob pa yin ras/ gzugs kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir thob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khye rang pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob du/

100a7('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus

101a1('bum): thob na/ ram pa thams cad saskyed pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ tshig gi 'dus tog pasas byung mamatshor ba gyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir thob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du rlom

101a3('bum): sa dang byas par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa sems par mabyon pa nyid du thob sa min nas/ ra bar 'dus reg pa sas thung ba'i tshor pa 'gas par bya ba'i phyir slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad
101a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te re/ ka pa las byung ba'i tshor ba kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sA'i
101a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyi slob na/ rnam paskams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob mas na nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod
101a6('bum): gas dang bral par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub pa yin na du/ sgra'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slo na/ rnam pa thams pad
101a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa sas byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
101a8('bum): ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam po
101b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te
101b2('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
101b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ su
101b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'iphyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
101b5('bum): gyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las/ byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thos
101b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus
101b7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
101b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
102a1('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams
102a2('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams 'dod
102a3('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu
102a4('bum): khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams ca dad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mye'i khams zad pa dar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
102a5('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ mye'i khams 'dod chags dang bral ba ra bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyerd pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mye'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
102a6('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mye'i khams kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/ rlung gi khams zad par bya ba'i phyir
102a7('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir skyob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams la/
102a8('bum): pa byed pa'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khas
102b1('bum): zang par bya ba'i phyir slob sa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyerd pa nyid du slob pa yin nas
102b2('bum): nam mkha'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ nam mkha'i khams kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
102b3('bum): yin nas/ rnam parags pa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob sa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par gas pa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
102b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnamapa shes pa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par /
102b5('bum): pa'i khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa zad pa/ ra bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
102b6('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob da/ rnam pa pa
102b7('bum): bar mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ ma rig pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyim slob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyerang pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob ni/ rnam pa thams
102b8('bum): ba ma byin pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bya bam phyi slob sa/ rnam pa thams cad mi byin pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'gag par bya zan phyir slob sa
103a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ 'du byed myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob sa/ rnam pa thams cad mnyan pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa mashes pa zang par
103a2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
103a3('bum): yin namarnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
103a4('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ mying dang gzugs zad par bya ba/ phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin/ nam/ myi nga dang gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
103a5('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mying dang gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

103b7('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ le nang pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
103b8('bum): le nang ma 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ le nad pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
104a1('bum): srid pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ srid pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

104a7('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
104a8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
104b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha ros tu phyind pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyis
104b2('bum): rosong tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thos
104b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
104b4('bum): pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
104b5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rold du phyi nad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i
104b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
104b7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod
104b8('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
105a1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
105a2('bum): phyind pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
105a3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar

105a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slom na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
105a7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam// / nang stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ma
105a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya
105b1('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid
105b2('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
105b3('bum): slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

105b5('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ nad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi skye/ bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
105b6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar
105b7('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob da/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ras stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'ag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa mams cad ma kyi rang pa nyid du slob pa yin nas
105b8('bum): thong pa nyid thongs nyid kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nga pa nyid du thog pa yin nas/ can pa stong pa nyid med par bya ba'i phyir slob sa/ rnam pa thams cad mabyin pa nyid
106a1('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'gag par bya

106a3('bum): stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngan dam pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

106a7('bum): phyir slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rlob pa yin nam/ 'dus
106a8('bum): ma byam stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob ma yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thos
106b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi skye bar

106b6('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dpa' ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
106b7('bum): yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob ma/ rnam
106b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa
107a1('bum): stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
107a2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba
107a3('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin
107a4('bum): stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
107a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad sto/ nga pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos
107a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
107a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chag
107a8('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
107b1('bum): sadagam can nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye bar bya ba la phyir grob// rnamathamams cad ma khyen pa nyid durna pa yimams/ phyi phyogs pa slongs nyid zar par bya ba 'byar slob na/ rna
107b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// myi
107b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
107b4('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sgo ba pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags
107b5('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ nad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyi da 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
107b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad
107b7('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
107b8('bum): pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thas
108a1('bum): bar mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngom pa
108a2('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
108a3('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
108a4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ na ba nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
108a5('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rmA ba pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'i 'gag parabya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
108a6('bum): slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na
108a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag
108a8('bum): par spong ba bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba ba'i myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed
108b1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar
108b2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob ra / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
108b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
108b4('bum): yin nam dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyi ra slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yi/ na nam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam

108b6('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs
108b7('bum): snga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ stobs lnga myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub
108b8('bum): kyi yan lag bdun zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

109a2('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
109a3('bum): yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
109a4('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma nad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thos

109a7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i gyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa bams cad mkhyed pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan pa'i bang bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa rnam
109a8('bum): bang mkhyerd pa nyid du slob pa yin ram/ bsam gtan pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan pa ni 'gag par bya
109b1('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi zar

109b3('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chad myed pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin na/

109b5('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyerd pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
109b6('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam

109b8('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa brkyang myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
110a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
110a2('bum): yin nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
110a3('bum): 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
110a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thard pa'i ske stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
110a5('bum): du slob pa yin nam rnam pa tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'dod chag/ sa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
110a6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam
110a7('bum): bar tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams zad par bya bar
110a8('bum): byir ma za pa rnam pa thams cad mabyed pa nyid du thob pa yin nas/ mngodod par shes pa rnams 'dang cags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyer da pa nyid du slob pa 'is
110b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
110b2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
110b3('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams
110b4('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mnad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
110b5('bum): slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par
110b6('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin
110b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
110b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
111a1('bum): bcu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi zad bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin na
111a2('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
111a3('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa ba'i myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thos
111a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag pa dar rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
111a5('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam/ pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so bdag par rig pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
111a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
111a7('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po
111a8('bum): skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
111b1('bum): na nas/ sangs rgyam byams ma 'dres pa bso bcud 'dod pags dang thal par bya ba'i phyir thob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed da pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ ngas rgyas byachom sa 'dres
111b2('bum): bco brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
111b3('bum): mkhye na pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgya nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ kun tu zhugs ba'i 'bras bu 'dang
111b4('bum): sa dang thas par b+hU ba'i sbyin tho / ma @dus bya pa da sa / rdzu tu rnags 'a bu phyi smrab/ rnam pa
111b5('bum): bang ma khyenang pa nyid du zab pa yin nas churang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gyi smra bar bya ba'i phyir sto da/ mal 'angs bye dpa nyid du ma'o ma yin nas/ yar
111b6('bum): phyi 'do ba'i 'bras bu zang par bya ba'i phyi thob sa/ pa bsas par babyed pa nyid du rnam pa yin nas/ 'i 'thas tha' dang us dang byas par bya
111b7('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ san cig phyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob ma yin nas/ lan ci/
111b8('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zang bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
112a1('bum): slob pa yin nas/ phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par
112a2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob narnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom
112a3('bum): ba nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid du slob pa
112a4('bum): yin namadagra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sloban rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
112a5('bum): thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slob pa yin nam rang byang chub bzad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang /
112a6('bum): bres par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rang byang chub
112a7('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin no/
112a8('bum): sam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
112b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob po yin nam/ sam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
112b2('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
112b3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slom pa sem nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye bar bya
112b4('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no//

112b6('bum): shA 5/ skye ba'am/ zhag par 'gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid dag yin / skyeb/ 'gan par 'gyur ram/ 'dushes kyi de banan
112b7('bum): kang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram
113a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am
113a2('bum): skye ba'ama'agag par 'gyur ram rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am
113a3('bum): skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ramalce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/

118b7('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob
118b8('bum): yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor da de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
119a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ dgra bcom nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rang byang chub la slob pa yin/
119a2('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
119a3('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bslab pa thams cad kyi pha
119a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur pa yin/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham
119a5('bum): par myi nus pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myu ra tu phyi ra myi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar
119a6('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdag gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul pa spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
119a7('bum): chen po ma ma gon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po no/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor dade
119a8('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
119b1('bum): mang yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor
119b2('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir/ slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa 'i
119b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
119b4('bum): po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun myi gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'chi ba myed pa'i
119b5('bum): sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltaraslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dus byas kyi khams bstand par bya'o zhes slob pa yin
119b6('bum): rab 'byor sems can dma' bas ni/ bslab pa rgya chen po 'dis bslab par gyi rus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa den/ sems can/
119b7('bum): thams cad 'khor ba las 'dod par 'dod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// sems can dmyal bar gyi skye'o// byol song gi skye gnas su mya
119b8('bum): skye'o// gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du myi skye'o// yul mtha' 'khob du myi skya'o// yul gcong rong can du myi skye'o// phyag dar ba dang / gdol pa'i rigs su myi skye'o// zhar bar myi 'gyur ro// sgur por myi
120a1('bum): 'gyur ro// zha bor myi 'gyur ro// yan lag skyon can du myi 'gyur ro// 'on par myi 'gyur ro// lag pa myed par myi 'gyur ro// dbang po dang myi ldan par myi 'gyur te/ dbang
120a2('bum): po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar myi 'gyur ro// srog gcod par myi 'gyur ro// ma byin par len par myi 'gyur ro// 'dod pas log par g.yem par myi 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra bar
120a3('bum): myi 'gyur ro// phra ma can du myi 'gyur ro// zhe gcod pa smra bar myi 'gyur ro// tshig kyal ba can du myi 'gyur ro// chags sems can du myi 'gyur ro// gnod sems can du myi 'gyur ro//
120a4('bum): log par lta bar myi 'gyur ro// 'tsho ba log pas 'tsho par myi 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzind par myi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa can du
120a5('bum): myi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzind pa ra myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha tshe rings pon
120a6('bum): nang du myi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga tshe rings por myi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de sa
120a7('bum): yod de/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstand pa ste/ thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
120a8('bum): dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/ tshad myed pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/
120b1('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang myi skye'o// rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
120b2('bum): po ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsosad pa
120b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin gis yongs su dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos gang gi yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags
120b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsasad pa/ rab 'byor/ re de bzhin na/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor dachos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
120b5('bum): yongs su dag pa / rab 'byor de de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
120b6('bum): spyod pa'il// sems zhum pa myed cing / 'god ba myed pa don/ rab 'byor dashes rab kyi pha 'o sang tu phyin pa ste/ byis pa mama'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni/ chos nyid de myi shes myi mthong bas
120b7('bum): mas pa na tu byung chub pamasadupa sems dpa shA kyi byedarnams kyi rloms sbyin pas ba
120b8('bum): pa sa myonga'apon 'grus kyi ma ro la tu phyind pa la spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha roso tu phyin pas spyod sa rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa sa spyod// rang chung pa nyid la spyod/ bya mo
121a1('bum): gapa nyid la spyodaphyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod
121a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid la spyod// thog ma dag myed pa stong pa nyid la spyodador ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod yoms ca
121a3('bum): pa nyid la spyod pagi tshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid hong
121a4('bum): pa nyid la spyodadran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyo da/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rka dang pa bzhi la spyod/ dbang po lnga la spyod/ stobs lnga la spyod
121a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan laka bdun la spyoda'aphags pa'ilam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/ tshad
121a6('bum): byed pa bzhi la spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par drug pa bzhi lnga spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngom la spyod/
121a7('bum): rnam par ba rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnamos la spyod/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod/ gzungs kyi skyon mas
121a8('bum): pa spyod pade bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/ myi 'jigs pa ba'i la spyod/ sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhis spyod/ snying rje chen po sa spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi choms
121b1('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la gyod/ rang byang chub
121b2('bum): la spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod de/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad
121b3('bum): kyi stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ngo // rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121b4('bum): chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs ka
121b5('bum): na 'angam bu chu krung gi gser gyis le snyam 'thung ba de ma nyung ngo // rab 'byor dade bzhin du 'dzin 'o// zhes rab kyim rom tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob po'i sems
121b6('bum): can de lta bu yang nyung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de zas ches mang ngo // rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na sems can
121b7('bum): ganga'akho mos sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag pa thangs te/ gnas pa de lta bu ni zung ste/ sems can gapa khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing / ma
121b8('bum): pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo // rab 'byor nga de bzhin du sems can gang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang rung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
122a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de las ches mang ngo // rab 'byor de gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
122a2('bum): yang dka par zhugs pa de dag pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin du nan tan byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su
122a3('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni chos mang ngo // rab 'byor da gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing the tsom myed par phyir myi ldog
122a4('bum): ba'i sa gnond pa de dag pas ni/ gang phyir myi ldog pa/ 'i sa gnond par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo // rab 'phyo/ rang de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
122a5('bum): po phyir myi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab
122a6('bum): 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// tshul khris nang dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o
122a7('bum): 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// se lo dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// shes rab 'tshal pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// 'dod chags
122a8('bum): dang ldand pa'i sems myi skye'o// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// za ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o//
122b1('bum): tshor ba dang ldand pa'i sems myi skye'o// 'du shes dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o/ 'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o/ rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// myig dang
122b2('bum): ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rna ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// sna dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// sde dang ldan pa'i sems mya skye'o// lus dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// yid dang ldan pa
122b3('bum): sems kyi skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// sgra dang ldan pa'i sems mya ston/ dri dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o/ ro dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// reg dang ldan pa'i ses
122b4('bum): myi skye'o// chos dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// myig gri rnam par shes pa dang ldan po'i sems myi skye'o// rna ba'i rnam pa ra shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// sna'i rnam par
122b5('bum): gyes pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// sgo'i rnam par/ shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// lus kyi rnam par/ shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// yid kyi rnam par
122b6('bum): shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rna ba'i dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// sna'i 'dus
122b7('bum): te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems
122b8('bum): myi skye'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dkyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o de'i chung ba da pa'i rkyed kyi da
123a1('bum): rgya rgyun bram tshum na pa tu cho dang da mang kyi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i
123a2('bum): sems myi skye'o// sa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// chu'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// mye'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rlung gi khams dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyer
123a3('bum): nam mkha'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// ma rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// 'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o
123a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// mying nga nga gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// skye mched drug dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// reg pa dang ldan pa'i seMs kyi skye
123a5('bum): tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// sred pa dang ldan ba'i sems myi skye'o// lend pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi// skye'o// srid pa' dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// skye ba
123a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rga shi dang ldan pa'i semasaphyi ste'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sem sa myi skye'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dang ldan
123a7('bum): ba'i sems kyi skye'o// bzod pa'i pha roso tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skyer/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
123a8('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// nang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// phyi stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye
123b1('bum): phyi rang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// chen po stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mes
123b2('bum): kyi skye'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// thog ma dang
123b3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// chos thams par spong pa nyi
123b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi smra'o// dngos po myed pa stong
123b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// dran pa nye bar
123b6('bum): gzhag pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// yang dag par spong ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyimyi skye'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// dbang po dang ldan pa'i mes
123b7('bum): skye'o// stobs dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// byang chub kyi san lak+sha dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// 'phags pa
123b8('bum): bden pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// bsam gtan dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o/ tshad myed pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skyer
124a1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
124a2('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// ting nge 'dzind dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o
124a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// myi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems
124a4('bum): kyi skye'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i
124a5('bum): sems myi skye'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i se// mas myi skye'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi/ smye'o// rang byang chub dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o/
124a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'od sngar byung
124a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'o/ chos gang yang dmyigs pa myed de/ ma dmyigs pas/ chos gang la yang sems bskyed pa myed
124a8('bum): // rab 'byor de de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad yongs su zind par 'gyur ro//
124b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur / pha rol tu gyi rang ba thams cad dang 'thun par spyad par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di sar zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
124b2('bum): pa zab mo 'dir/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jig tshogs su lta bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/ rab
124b3('bum): 'byor de de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang po
124b4('bum): 'gag pas/ dbang po thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'ang
124b5('bum): la spyod pas/ pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor de de bas na/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po pha rold tu phyin pa thams cad kyi
124b6('bum): pha ro yong tu 'gro bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la sgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa
124b7('bum): sems dpa'aldan pa / sems can thams cad kyis chogs gyu pas slob pa yin na// rab byed de rjemam dumams/ song gsum kyis chen po'i 'dug sbyin rnamasas
124b8('bum): can kang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag ma pa ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams
125a1('bum): kyang mang ba lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor
125a2('bum): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams kyi sems can kang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par/ mye'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
125a3('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re sa yang sku tshe'i mthar phyi nad kyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rgyun ma chad
125a4('bum): par na bza dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / spu nad kyi rkyend sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
125a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nam sa de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bco ma ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
125a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa sad pa/ rab 'byor de de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par
125a7('bum): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
125a8('bum): chen po rnams kyi zhes rab kyi pha rosod tu phyin pa ni/ de ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'o// rab 'byor de de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
125b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi/ bla na myed par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can 'gon myed pa thams cad kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / skyabs myed pa rnams kyi skyebs su
125b2('bum): 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / gnas myed pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / long ba rnams kyi myig tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mu nad par gnas pa rnams kyi smon mar 'gyur bar 'dzin
125b3('bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rold pas rnam pa che bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge na
125b4('bum): nga ro bsgrag par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rung bud par 'dod pa dang sangs rgyas kyi gtam bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
125b5('bum): rold tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'phyo rang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni phun sum tshogs pa
125b6('bum): gang thob par bya ba de dag las myi 'thob pa gang yang myed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bgyi ba lags
125b7('bum): sam rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang / des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des
125b8('bum): 'thob par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des 'thob par bya ste/ de la gnas par myi bya/ 'dug par myi bya'i zhes pa dang / mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste/ 'da' bar bya/
126a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud par bya'o// rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang nye bar gyur/
126a2('bum): pa yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngond par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang
126a3('bum): myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i
126a4('bum): gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnand cing / 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
126a5('bum): dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myi gtong zhing / shes rab kyi pha
126a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o// rab 'byor de de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
126a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid las yongs su myi nyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rong du byed cing / bla na myed pa
126a8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di la/ shes rab kyi
126b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste/ gal te de ltar shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// gal te 'di ni shes
126b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar shes pa myed de/ gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa zung ba dang / ga nas na kyi la tu phyid
126b3('bum): roladu tu phyind pas zung ste/ thA na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ang chub des bu yang myi shes kyi mthong zhing / de 'di snyam ste/ chom kyi dbyings pa
126b4('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas paphyir/ 'di ni zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'din
126b5('bum): yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dis ni/ chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang myed do zhes/ rab 'byor nga de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub se
126b6('bum): xxx
126b7('bum): bzhi bcu bdun no//
126b8('bum): denam pa'i dbang po brgya byidang 'dimam sems par gyur / dis kyang chum mam sa dpa sems dpa can yo/ sbyin pa'i pha ro la tu phyin pa dang / rgyas tha
127a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
127a2('bum): tu phyind pa la yang spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
127a3('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin tong pa nyid dang / chos
127a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa ste/ ngapa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i/
127a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
127a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang spyod// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang gzugs
127a7('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang spyod// rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
127a8('bum): myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yang spyod// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
127b1('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang spyod bzhin du/ sems can
127b2('bum): thams cad zil gyis mnon na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na lta ci smos/ sems can gang gi/ sems rnam pa thams
127b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing / de dag gi 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na/ gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
127b4('bum): bskyed pa dag lta ci smos/ sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyand pa de dag ni/ kun
127b5('bum): kyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog man 'da' ra ba mang po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas
127b6('bum): me tog man 'da' ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor da to// de ltar gtor
127b7('bum): te/ mngon par gtor pa dang / rab tu gtor bar byas nas/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bkang gis/ bla na myed
127b8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmyigs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/
128a1('bum): rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyu rang cig zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyu rad cig bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems
128a2('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ slar ldog par 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
128a3('bum): bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar log ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
128a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa skyed cing yang dang yang du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'a debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag/
128a5('bum): mthong nas lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du brtsas pa'i 'jig rten da gi don du mos smand par mos bde bar mos shing / legs par bgyi bar mos te/ ses
128a6('bum): bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste/ ci bdag rgal nas sems can ma rgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag kros nas
128a7('bum): sems can ma grol ba 'grol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag dbugs phyin nas/ sems can dbugs ma byind pa/ dbugs 'byind par 'gyur ram/ ci bdag yongs su mya ngan
128a8('bum): las 'das nas/ sems can yongs su mya ngan pas ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram rtog par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i
128b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la/ rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
128b2('bum): kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar 'gyid pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rung bar bgyid par
128b3('bum): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la/ rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
128b4('bum): dzi tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces pa ka' brtsal to// ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig
128b5('bum): rtend kyi khams ni/ skra'i rtse mo'i ched kyis tshad gzung ba ra rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su mi rang ba dang ldan/ ba'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad myed do//
128b6('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gi khams ni/ sgra'i ri mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams
128b7('bum): la ni tshad myed do// ke'u shi ka stong kanyis kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams ni/ skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung ba rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
128b8('bum): pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad myed do// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenang gi khams ni/ skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung ba rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su
129a1('bum): rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad myed do// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po
129a2('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de ni/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i cha gcig gis chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yaM rang ba dang ldan pa'i/ sems bskyed
129a3('bum): pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad myed do// de skad ces bka' bal pa dang ga'idim po gis ma ldan 'das pa 'di gad pe po te bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar myi bapyod
129a4('bum): pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi byind kyis brlabs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar myi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni/
129a5('bum): bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'dasagang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar myi bgyidapa'i sems can de dag ni/ bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos
129a6('bum): pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas
129a7('bum): 'jig par bgyid pa ste/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste/ gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma
129a8('bum): btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis/ sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o// rjes su yi rang nas bla na myed pa yang dag par
129b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi ste// ji ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su ma mchis pa'i 'du shes su yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o//
129b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// ke'u shi ka ga sems bskyed pa 'di dag la/ rjes su yi rang bar byed
129b3('bum): pa de dag ni myu rang tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar myi 'gyur
129b4('bum): de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i nga ge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa dag ni/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang / de dag du rim gro bya bar 'gyur ro// bkur bsti
129b5('bum): bya bar 'gyur ro// phu dung du bya bar 'gyur ro// mchod bar bya bar 'gyur ro// des nam yang gzugs yod du myi 'ong ba mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// nam yang sgra yid du
129b6('bum): myi 'ong ba zos par myi 'gyur ro// nam yang dri yid du kyi 'ong ba tshor bar myi 'gyur ro// nam yang ro sad du myi 'ong ba myong bar myi 'gyur ro// nam yang reg yid du myi 'ong ba reg par myi 'gyur ro/
129b7('bum): nam yang chos yid du myi 'ong ba shes par myi 'gyur ro// nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
129b8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
130a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad
130a2('bum): byed/ grangs myed/ dpag tu myed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i cha de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i phyir te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis rnam par 'phel bas
130a3('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te/ de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can tshad
130a4('bum): myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa/ yongs su mya ngan sa sa zlo bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu des ci nas kyang sems myed
130a5('bum): pa dang sems ma yin pa gzhan yang myed par theg pa la ga sar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da / 'a chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i cha ba la rjes su yi rang par
130a6('bum): byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// sems myed pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang byed par spyad pa spyod pa dang / phyi
130a7('bum): ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang rjes su yi rang bar byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// /
130b1('bum): bam po / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso//
130b2('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sems bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu bar 'gyur ba lag / bcom ldan 'das kyis
130b3('bum): dka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan
130b4('bum): 'das bdag gis sgyu ma yang / yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de yang ya bdag par rjes su dam mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
130b5('bum): pa rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ de ltar sgyu ma yang ma mthong sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang ma mthong na/ sa gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
130b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i sems de/ khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
130b7('bum): bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
130b8('bum): 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de/ khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mtho ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las
131a1('bum): las gud na chos gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de/ bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das re
131a2('bum): ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ mchis pa'am/ ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstand par bgyi/ chos gang shi nad tu dben pa'i de ni mchis pa'am
131a3('bum): ma mchis par myi 'gyur ro// chos gang shi nang tu dben pa de ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang kyi rgya ste/ ma mchis pa'i chos kyang
131a4('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mdo na par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// de ci'i slad du dazhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang nyon mos
131a5('bum): par 'gyur ba 'amarnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing / yongs su ma maN+Da sa pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de
131a6('bum): ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni shi nad tu dben pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni shinang tu dben pa'/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shinang tu dben
131a7('bum): 'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi nang tu dbend pa'o// rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gi nang tu dben pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shinang tu dben pa'o// rlung stso
131a8('bum): pa nyid ni shinang tu dbe nang pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni shind tu dbend pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shinang tu dbend pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu
131b1('bum): tung banam/ dan dam pa stong sa ci nag ring tung bar/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni na d+ha ngan / mas rgyas slongs cad na shin tu dben pa'o// mtha' mas 'das pastong pa /
131b2('bum): nang tu dben pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o// chos thams cad rlo
131b3('bum): pa nyid ni shi nang tu dben pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shinang tu dben pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni shind tu dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid
131b4('bum): pa nyid ni nin tu dben pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngab nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o// dran pa nye bar/ 'ag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o// yang dag par spong ba
131b5('bum): rnams ni shi nang tu dben pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam sa ni shi nang tu dben pa'o// dbang po rnams ni shin tu danatha'/ stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o// byang chub
131b6('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ni shi nang tu dbend pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu
