148b4('bum): ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyi ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yid kyi
148b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/
148b6('bum): chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
148b7('bum): rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
148b8('bum): ba dben pa'o// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
149a1('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
149a2('bum): rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dber pa'o// sreng pa dben pa'i
149a3('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// le nad pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// skye ba
149a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rga shi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir
149a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
149a6('bum): phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bas gtan
149a7('bum): kI pha rol tu phyi nad pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dben pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid
149a8('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
149b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
149b2('bum): pa dben pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
149b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
149b4('bum): ba'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben
149b5('bum): ba'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
149b6('bum): ro la tu phyind pa dben pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro
149b7('bum): tu phyind pa dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rolar tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold
149b8('bum): tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
150a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dbang po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
150a2('bum): pa dben pa'o// stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan
150a3('bum): lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir shes
150a4('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab
150a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam par thard pa dang/ nad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i
150a6('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dbend pa'o// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o/
150a7('bum): mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ting nge 'dzind dbend pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir shes
150a8('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
150b1('bum): dbend pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dpe nad pa'o// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// sangs
150b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong
150b3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i
150b4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ma ki rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
150b5('bum): tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben ba'o// lha'i bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpa
150b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dben par bshad pa la/ sems myi 'dzum yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur la/ de'i yid 'jigs par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsas to// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir byang chub sem
150b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
151a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma skyes pa'i slad du byang chub seMs
151a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
151a3('bum): bzhum par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang la zhum par 'gyur pa'i chos
151a4('bum): de dag thams cad na mi mchis pa ste/ dmyigs su ma ma chis so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de skad du bshad pa
151a5('bum): la myi 'dzum myi 'gong zhing chi chad pa dang sgyid lug par myi 'gyur ba de ni/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
151a6('bum): pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ gang zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag
151a7('bum): thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang
151a8('bum): bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol
151b1('bum): tu phyind pa sa spyod pa de ni/ dbang po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bya bar yang ma zad de/ kang 'phags pa mngon par 'phag
151b2('bum): pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang mo'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
151b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de la phyag bya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nang gi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs
151b4('bum): myed tshad myed pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de ngag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad
151b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ tshul khrims/
151b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// badz+ra da ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
151b7('bum): par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
151b8('bum): par byed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed so'o// chen po stong pa
152a1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed par don ngas pa stong pa tang sangs su thogs par byed pa'o 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su sogs par byed pan / 'dum ma byas stong pa nyid yongs
152a2('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su
152a3('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
152a4('bum): pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed/ pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/
152a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya/ dpa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzog/ sa par byed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su
152a6('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba'i yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan
152a7('bum): sag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa byani yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam gtan
152a8('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par thard pa brgyad
152b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par tha rang po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa
152b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin
152b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// snying rje chen po yongs su
152b4('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rgyu nad tu zhu gas pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lan
152b5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang byung
152b6('bum): chub yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// sam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes dgongs pa mdzad do// rab 'byor
152b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni/ gapal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
152b8('bum): de ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar zhugs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams dag na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdi to can du gyur te/
153a1('bum): bdud sdig ton na de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud sdig tocan mngon par sprus kyang / de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar chad bya bar myi rus so//
153a2('bum): rab 'byor de chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ des chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar rnam
153a3('bum): par bltas pa yin/ des sems can thams cad kyang yongs su ma btang ba yin te/ rab 'byor de chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdud sdig to
153a4('bum): can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin no// rab 'byorang gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang
153a5('bum): ldan pa ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te gnyis gang zhe na/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
153a6('bum): dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches de gnyis dang ldan pa ni/ bdud sdig to can rnams kyis kyi thub pa
153a7('bum): yin no// rab 'byor de de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dring du ni/ sna'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems so// bsnyen bkur ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang /
153a8('bum): kun dri ba yang byed par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur tu 'thob par 'gyur gyis/ de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang / mtshan
153b1('bum): ma myed pas rnam par spyod pa dang / smond pa myed pas rnam par spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyad pa
153b2('bum): dang / sems can 'gon byed pa rnams kyi 'gon du 'gyur ro// sems can skyabs myed pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro// sems can dpung nyen myed pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro//
153b3('bum): sems can gnas myed pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can rtend myed pa rnams kyi chenang du 'gyur ro// sems can gling myed pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro// sems can sund par
153b4('bum): par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro// zhes de la spro ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rtend gi khams cad myed grangs myed pa dkan
153b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kapa'i snyed ci/ slong gi dge 'dun gis yongs su bsko nga / btsun ba shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / stodang pa de dag kyang byang chu
153b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sas
153b7('bum): dpa' chen po de snying dang / rigs yongs su rjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / tshod du brjod pa ched du rjod pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na pad ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
153b8('bum): dpa' chen po rini cen dpal gyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du rjod pa ched du rjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gtsug pung gi mying yongs su rjod pa'i
154a1('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du rjod pa ched du rjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i zham ring na/ tshangs pa'i
154a2('bum): spyad pa spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ma bral ba de dag gi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / ched du brjod pa ched du rjod pa bzhin no// sharang phyogs kyi sangs
154a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes
154a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar ma dzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ ched du brjod la ched du brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
154a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyo nga ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i
154a6('bum): spyad pa spyod cing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
154a7('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol
154a8('bum): tu phyind pa dang / ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa med du rjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
154b1('bum): skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'i snyed gi sa bskyed pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar
154b2('bum): mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong pa dang
154b3('bum): chos stond pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad
154b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// sharang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
154b5('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha
154b6('bum): rol tu phyinod pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
154b7('bum): 'das bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad
154b8('bum): pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// nub byad kyi phyogs mtshams
155a1('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed
155a2('bum): cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs
155a3('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i
155a4('bum): spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / mo bral ba de dag pa spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gis chos s+ho/ nad te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do//
155a5('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa ngag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
155a6('bum): chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gis chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do//
155a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod
155a8('bum): pa de dag la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da byang
155b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun myi 'chad pa'i don tu zhugs pa'i de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
155b2('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog pa'am/ slar gyi ldog pa'am/ gang gi mying yongs su rjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
155b3('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog pa las// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na lung ma nyan
155b4('bum): pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nga yod de/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
155b5('bum): ched du brjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// ka sad pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor bya
155b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su
155b7('bum): slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor dkar
155b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin can dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar
156a1('bum): mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi
156a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad skye ba myed par mos kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang /
156a3('bum): chos thams cad gsog gsob ste/ rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po myang ba'o zhes bya bar mos kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro
156a4('bum): bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / sangs rgyas
156a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams mying yongs su rjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis
156a6('bum): ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang lung bstan pa yin/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
156a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / ched du rjod pa yang ched du rjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub
156a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ phyir myi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bya
156b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo bshad pa thos na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa/
156b2('bum): de bzhin no zhes nem nur myed cing / the tsom myi za la rmongs par myi 'gyur na/ des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa
156b3('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing
156b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstand pa de bzhin du mos pas phyir ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
156b5('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos pa ni phan pa mang por 'gyurar ba yin te gang gis mos shing mos nas/ de bzhin nyid du
156b6('bum): gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni smos kyang mya smos te/ de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gnas par
156b7('bum): 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid du gnas nas/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis te/ chos gang yang ma dmyigs na/ de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la
156b8('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma rtogs pa'i chos kyang gang yang myi dmyigs na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la
157a1('bum): gnas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid
157a2('bum): kyang dmyigs su ma mchis na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang
157a3('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / chos stond par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dkang khyod kyis 'di skad du gang de
157a4('bum): bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing
157a5('bum): chos stond par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par gzhan dmyigs su myed do// de ba zhin nyid kyang dmyigs su myed na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas
157a6('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / chos stond par 'gyur
157a7('bum): ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor dgang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la
157a8('bum): gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos stond par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la
157b1('bum): ma gtogs par gzhan dmyigs su myed de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su myed na/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
157b2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos stond par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
157b3('bum): byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o//
157b4('bum): chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid / bachos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de de bzhin nyid la ni gang yang
157b5('bum): garnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ des gnas shi tha kyiyang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu mngon par par 'ang rgyu bar 'gyur ba suya mya na/ de lag
157b6('bum): shing chos stond par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes
157b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'din zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
157b8('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de'i rjid du de bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis ste/ su yang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la bla na myed pa yangapad/
158a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang gang yang ma mchis te/ chos ston pa yang gang yang ma mchis la/ des zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de dag la nem
158a2('bum): su du 'gyur ba'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de nas gnas gartan rab 'byor da kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gang
158a3('bum): khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du myi 'gyur/ rmongs par myi 'gyur ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsol
158a4('bum): pa ni ke'u shi ka chos thams cad tong pa yin na/ de la ne ma nur du 'gyur ba'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod/ brgya byind kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan da rab
158a5('bum): 'byor da ni gang ci stond kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid b.rams shing stond te/ ci la yang chags pa myed do// 'di lta ste dper na/ bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ci
158a6('bum): la yang chags pa myed do/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor da kyis chos bstand pa yang ci la yang chags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa
158a7('bum): las le'u bzhi bcu dgu'o//
158a8('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bdag gis de skad du gsol to//
158b1('bum): de skad du brjod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung bstand pas/ lung bstand par 'gyur ba lags
158b2('bum): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te/ de skad du brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su rjod pa dang / chos su rjod cing
158b3('bum): chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung stond par 'gyur ro// brgya byind kyis gsol dam/ bcom ldan 'das gnas brtand rab 'byor da 'dis ci dang ci spobs pa de thams cad stong pa nyid bcas
158b4('bum): shing spobs/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid brtsams ni/ pa spobs/ smond pa ma mchis pa nyid bsams shing spobs// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid 'jams
158b5('bum): shing spobs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
158b6('bum): phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid brtsams shing spobs// nang stong pa nyid
158b7('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ phyi stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyin pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing
158b8('bum): spobs/ don dam pa tong pa nyid batshams shing spobs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid batshams shing spobs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid batshams shing spobs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
159a1('bum): nyid brtsams shing spobs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing
159a2('bum): spobs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bathams shing spobs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa stong
159a3('bum): pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid batshams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams brtsams shing
159a4('bum): spobs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spob sa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams pa tshams shing spobs dbang po rnams brtsams shing spobs/ stobs rnams
159a5('bum): bsams shing spobs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams pa mas shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pa rkyad pa la brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i bden
159a6('bum): ba rnams brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan rnams bsams shing spobs/ tshad myed pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing
159a7('bum): spobs/ rnam par thard pa rnams pa thams shing spobs/ mab rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams pa rtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
159a8('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed parna las shing spobs/ mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs ting nge 'dzind rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsams shing spobs pa
159b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/ myi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ pa mo yang dag par rig pa rnams bsams shing spobs/ snying rje chen po bsams
159b2('bum): shing spobs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ba sams shing spobs
159b3('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid batshams shing spobs/ rnam pa zhes
159b4('bum): cid mkhyen pa nyid bsams shing spobs pa ngom tshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da/ ka niHgnas brtan rab 'byor da stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod/
159b5('bum): pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang kyi dmyigs nagang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smom chus khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyig
159b6('bum): dag tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/
159b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang brtsor 'grus kyi pha ro sad tu phyin pa sa spyod pas ni smos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi myi
159b8('bum): nagang bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos
160a1('bum): rlung stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang na stong pa nyid la sos pa lta ci smos gyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la mos pa lta ci smos/ phyi nang skyong
160a2('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ chen po stong pa
160a3('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chen po stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus byas stong
160a4('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid sa sgom pa lta ci smos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sgom/
160a5('bum): ba lta ci smos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
160a6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos
160a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sgom
160a8('bum): ba lta ci smos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ kang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang myi dmyigs
160b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang ngo po
160b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos// dran pa nye bar gzhag
160b3('bum): pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos
160b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rdul phrul ki rkang pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dbang po rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang dbang po rnams la sgom pa
160b5('bum): lta ci smos stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ stobs rnams lnga sgom pa lta ci smos/ byang chub kyi yan laka rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang byang chub kyi yan
160b6('bum): lag rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang myi dmyigs na gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sgom pa lta ci smos 'phags pa'i bden
160b7('bum): ba rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bsam gtan rnams sgom pa lta ci smos
160b8('bum): cad myed pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang tshad myed pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gzugs byed pa na snyam
161a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thard pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rnam par thard pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mthar gis gnas pa'i smos
161a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
161a3('bum): dang smond pa myed pa yang myi dmyigs na/ gang rnam par thard pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang mya
161a4('bum): dmyigs na gang mngon par shes pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smras/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang ting nge 'dzind rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos
161a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mya dmyigs na/ gang gzung sa kyi sgo rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshe/ gas pa'i stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs na// de bzhin
161a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rna 'an pasgru ba lta ci smos myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ kang myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa lta ci smos/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang
161a7('bum): myi dmyigs na gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa ste ci smos/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos/ sangs
161a8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub pa lta ci smos/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi
161b1('bum): gang rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/
161b2('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs nA/ gang dgra bcom pa'i/ sa bu rjes su 'an
161b3('bum): pa lta ci smos/ rang byang chub nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang lam gyi rnam pa shes
161b4('bum): panyidarjes su 'thob pA s+thA ci smos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi phyogs na/ kAng napa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta
161b5('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang de bzhin kags par 'gyur ba lta mi smos/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa sa
161b6('bum): spros/ mtshan rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba ste ci smos/ dbye byad rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gi lus pa dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba
161b7('bum): smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor da ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ dmyigs su myed pa la rnam par spyod pa/ stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa mtshan
161b8('bum): ma myed pa la rnam par spyad pa/ smond pa myed pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
162a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa/ brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gre'o// stong gi char yang
162a2('bum): bar myi 'gro'o// brgya phraka stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag
162a3('bum): stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gre'o// grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
162a4('bum): gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang /
162a5('bum): nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
162a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o// rab ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa gong na myed
162a7('bum): pa mnyam pa skyed pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas 'di sa
162a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'
162b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po na nyin thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nasasas rgyas gyim mas su rgos 'phru
162b2('bum): rgya rnam yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshan
162b3('bum): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//
162b4('bum): bam po / de nas 'khor de'i na nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum kyi lha rnams
162b5('bum): me tog man 'da' ra ba mang po thogs te/ bcom lda na 'das la gtor to// mngond par gtor to// rab tu \u0f7fto rang to// dge slong brgya phrag drug tsam yang stan
162b6('bum): las langs nas/ chos gos phrag pa cig la gabar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bar btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
162b7('bum): byig myi 'dzums par lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ btung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa me tog man 'dra' ra bas gang bar gyur nas/ me tog mar
162b8('bum): rnam pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// de ltar 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor ba dang
163a1('bum): rab tu 'thor ba'i tshe/ tshig 'di skad ces rjod de/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa'i rnam par spyod pa dam
163a2('bum): pas bdag cag rnam par spyod par gyu ra cig ces smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
163a3('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis kyang / de ste de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'di lta ste/ 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / mar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rga nad dang
163a4('bum): shel dang / gardul gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang nas/ phyir 'dus te bcom ldan
163a5('bum): 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs nas/ tha
163a6('bum): gos phrag pa cig du byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i snabs la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka sa pa der logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
163a7('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang / rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyend kyis mdzum pa
163a8('bum): mdzad// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// dga' bo dge slong brgya drug cu po 'di dag bskal pa dpe skar ma lta
163b1('bum): bu la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
163b2('bum): shabacag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun mtshungs
163b3('bum): par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs par 'gyur/ tshe'i tshad kyang 'di lta ste/ so stong du mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par byung nas
163b4('bum): rab tu 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'apa rgyal 'gyu ded de dag tu me tog kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i
163b5('bum): me tog gi char mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro// dag/ 'bo de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' / na po rnam par spyod pa'i dam pas/ rnam par spyod par
163b6('bum): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pas/ rnam par spyod par 'dod pas
163b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu ma
163b8('bum): res 'di ltar bdag ni myi'i nang nas/ shi 'phos nas 'dir skye ba'am/ dka' ldan ki lha'i ris nas/ shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa ste/ myi'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
164a1('bum): rgya cher thos pa'am/ dka' ldan ki lha'i ris su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'o zhes bya bar rtog par rig par bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems
164a2('bum): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la myod pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par blta ste/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha
164a3('bum): rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyand pa dang / thos nas 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnaMs
164a4('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyon cing / rjes su 'dems pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de sa bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
164a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyurapa/ gzung ba dang / bcang sa pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas par gyur te
164a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par gyur da to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya ste/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des/
164a7('bum): bdag gis ni nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed/ nyan thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yin no// zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
164a8('bum): bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / don dang / chos dang / yi ge dang / 'thun par khong du chud par byed na/ dga' bo rahI
164b1('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag sa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon tu gyur to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
164b2('bum): mo gang sa la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstand pa thos na/ phyir myi ldog cing ngan du gyi chod la thos nas kyang mos pa thob par 'gyur na/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sngon gi rgyal bas bya
164b3('bum): byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/
164b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lta yang myi slu ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ sa ngas rgyas su 'gyur mod kyi/ 'o nad kyang dka' bo byang chub
164b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ pas spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang
164b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
164b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la pyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong
164b8('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
165a1('bum): la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid masas sbyong ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs
165a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzha
165a3('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la gyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub
165a4('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang // 'phags pa 'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnam
165a5('bum): sa spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / zugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa da nga / rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthard
165a6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod
165a7('bum): pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mye 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yong
165a8('bum): dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang // rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / lan cig phyir
165b1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gyod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa
165b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod pas/ shind tu rtogs par bya'o// shi nad tu rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
165b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
165b4('bum): spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi hong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
165b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dus bya ba stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong
165b6('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
165b7('bum): spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dpyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa'o tong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
165b8('bum): ngo bo nyid 'atong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngas po myed pa'i khyod stong pa nyid la pyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnag na la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
166a1('bum): spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
166a2('bum): spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
166a3('bum): spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyad pa dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug rna rnams spyo pa dang / rnam par tha da palen stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mye
166a4('bum): ba dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang
166a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs rnams la spyod pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag pararog pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod
166a6('bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
166a7('bum): spyod pa ni/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su myi 'gyur ro// dga' bo de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad de/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos
166a8('bum): gopa'i snyed cig bshad pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma gtogs par ngas chos bstand pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chud gsan te/ bor yang
166b1('bum): de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la skyond tu ngas myi mi'i/ dka' bo gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chud kasan tam bor bar gyur
166b2('bum): na des ni dka' bo khyod ngas skyon tu bzung ngo // dga' bo de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad kyis/ ci nas kyang gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub
166b3('bum): par bya ba dang / shi nad tu yid la gzung bar gyis shig/ legs par yongs su zind pa dang / legs par kun chub pa dang / legs par bcang bar gyis shig/ yi ge dang / tshig dang / 'bru shi na tu rdzogs
166b4('bum): pa dang / nges pa'i tshig legs par shi nad tu zind par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang /
166b5('bum): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das kyi byang chub bzung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo
166b6('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa des ni 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub 'thun
166b7('bum): bar yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dka' bo mngon du gyu rad par ngal kang me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
166b8('bum): dan gyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur btir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang par bya// klag
167a1('bum): par bya/ kund chud par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ bcangs nas klags shing / kund chub par bya ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos
167a2('bum): rang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bahir bya/ phu dud du bya/ mchod par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
167a3('bum): pa la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas nas/ des ni nga yang mchod par 'gyur/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang
167a4('bum): mchod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bahand pa la rim gro dang / dka' ba dang / mos pa skyed pa des ni 'das pa dang /
167a5('bum): ma byor pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / dka' ba dang / mos pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// dka' bo gal te khyod ya ngasdug
167a6('bum): cing yid du 'ong la yongs su ma btang zhe na/ dka' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yongs su myi gtang bar gyis shig/ ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha
167a7('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la tshig 'ga' yang khyod kyis chung ma thos par gyis shig/ dka' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di gtad pa batshams te/ khyod la shin tu mang du bcan
167a8('bum): pa yang mdom na dga' bo khyod la pa'i ltar stond par gyur pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'di sa khyod kyi stond pa yin gyis/ dga' bo de bas nangs khyod la chad myed par gtad pas
167b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongs su gtad de/ dga' bo de bas na/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend gi mdun du brjod de/ sus kyang sangs rgyas yongs/
167b2('bum): sum btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su
167b3('bum): ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btang ba
167b4('bum): myi bya ste/ 'di ni nga'i// dam ngag ko/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang 'phel
167b5('bum): bar byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nus bzhin du mings kyang ba dang / gzhanas yang shes rab kyi pha ros phyi nang pa zab mo 'di nam grangs du mar rgya cher 'chad pa dang /
167b6('bum): stonang pa dang / rab tu stond pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'gresang pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par nyond pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
167b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
167b8('bum): dka' bo shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs
168a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol
168a2('bum): tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/
168a3('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnaM sa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo da ltar byung ba ni dus na/ shar daphyogs kyi 'jig rtend ki khams tshad myed
168a4('bum): grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji ste da cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i
168a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i
168a6('bum): dus na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsha
168a7('bum): spyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung
168a8('bum): ba'i dus na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kang ji snyed cig bzhugs
168b1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo
168b2('bum): daltar byung ba'i dus na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi 'ams cad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kya 'ji skad cig
168b3('bum): bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung
168b4('bum): ngo dka' bo da ltar byung po'i dus na/ byang shar gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams cad myed grangs myed zag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
168b5('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cigabazhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag
168b6('bum): par joms pa'i byang chub kya shes rab kyi pha royod tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bod ltar byung ba'i dusan/ ger lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams cad myed grangs myed
168b7('bum): na dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho srung ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed/
168b8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus da / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams cad myed
169a1('bum): grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas
169a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi
169a3('bum): 'jig rte nang gi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
169a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa la dang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo // dka' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus
169a5('bum): na 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kang ji snyed
169a6('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid las byung ngo /
169a7('bum): dasa' tho da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams chad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dgun/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
169a8('bum): gapa 'i snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
169b1('bum): ngasam thung / dga' tho debs na/ thun myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'cha slu bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin dpa rgyag sa bslab par 'dod pa'i byang chub la
169b2('bum): mas kyis khyed kyi byon brlags slob pa de dag thams cad de/ zla byeng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung ba / dan mtha
