229b5('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ste/ yun ring po ci srid cig nas
229b6('bum): yang dag par zhugs pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba lad pa/ rab 'byor dathabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bskal
229b7('bum): dbye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan
229b8('bum): ba des sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la da pa/ rab 'byor da thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
230a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po des ni sangs rgyas gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsnyen bkur bar rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
230a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bskrund pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed
230a3('bum): pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa des/ yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu
230a4('bum): gang yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed
230a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongasasu rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phye/ na pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do// byang chub sems
230a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs
230a7('bum): su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i shes rab
230a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngom ra
230b1('bum): che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni dzi/
230b2('bum): mtshar che'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gling bzhir las byed cing / gling bzhi'i rjes su 'gro'o// gling bzhi'i rjes su 'brang ngo // rab
230b3('bum): 'byor de de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyi dad pa yang pha rold tu phyind pa lngar las byed cing / pha rold tu phyind pa lnga'i rjes su 'gro'o// pha rol tu phyind pa lnga'i rjes su 'brang ste/ shes rab
230b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral na pha rol tu phyin dpa lnga/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying thob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa
230b5('bum): swA/ pha rold tu phyind pa'i mying myi 'thob bo// rab byo nga 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bral na/ rin po che bdun gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mying
230b6('bum): myi 'thob bo// rab 'byor de de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying myi 'thob bo// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
230b7('bum): khyim thab skyed pa'i bung byed rnams ni 'phyon ma rnams kyis tshugs par smra ba yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga snang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral na/ bdud
230b8('bum): dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim thab dpa' bos shin tu bsrungs pa'i bud myed shi nang tu phun sum tshogs pa'i khyim na 'dug pa ni 'byor
231a1('bum): ma rnams kyis myi tshugs pa yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams
231a2('bum): kyis myi tshugs pa yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yul du 'gro ba'i skyes bu ko cha tshang bar gyon pa mtshon cha thams cad thogs pa ni/ g.yul ngon 'dug pa'i tshe/
231a3('bum): po zla'am phyir rgol ba dang dgra rnams kyis thub par dka'// rab 'byor de bzhin du pa ro yod tu phyind pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ bdud dam bdud kyims kyi
231a4('bum): lha rnams dang / gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nam/ byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa rnams kyis thub par dka' rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
231a5('bum): po la khams kyi rgyal po yod pa rnams ni nang nub nang du cing rim gro bya ba'i don du drung du 'ong ngo // rab 'byor/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha
231a6('bum): rolang tu phyind pas yongs su zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong ngo // rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ chu klung kang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ni/
231a7('bum): chu klung chen po gang gA kang na ba der 'dong ngo // de dag chu klung gang 'aka' dang 'grogs shing / rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dong ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa sna yang shes
231a8('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su zind ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang na bar der 'dong ngo // rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas pa ni dgos pa thams
231b1('bum): cangad byed do// rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa yang de bzhin du blta ste/ pha rol tu phyi nad pa lA ni/ lag pa g.yon pa ji lta pa bzhin du blta'o// rab 'byor nga 'di sa ste dper
231b2('bum): mdu klung phra mo rnams kyi chu dang / chu klung chen po rnams kyi chug paji snyed cig yod pa de ngas thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen por gyimin 'di lta ste/ lan tsa'i ror ro cig par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
231b3('bum): de ba'i ni du pha rolang tu phyind pa lnga sang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su 'dzin/ rnam pa thams cad ma khye nang pa nyid du phyin na 'dis ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
231b4('bum): ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du ni 'khor lo rin po che
231b5('bum): 'gro zhing 'dug ste/ kang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal mo zas kyi don du 'dug par gyur pa dpa la cho mopa smra ba'i rgyasapo'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par byed
231b6('bum): cing / 'khor los rin po che gnas nas gau yo ba myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pas yongasu dkri ba yin te/ rnam pa
231b7('bum): thams ca ma khyend pa nyid grangan pa der 'do ste der gnas so// der gnas par gyur nas kyang gnas re las phyi 'da'o// rab 'byor 'dos dperan/ 'tshamams sbyar ba'i
231b8('bum): rgyal po'i 'khor lo na po che dang / sngon po rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / chud byed rin po de dang / nor bu ring po med dang / glang po rin mo ming dang / rtarin po med dag no// dbang
232a1('bum): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dong ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang / pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag gi mdun du 'gro
232a2('bum): ste/ mdun du song nas kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa
232a3('bum): 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni
232a4('bum): 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin brtson 'grus kyi
232a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi
232a6('bum): sems so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang
232a7('bum): 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rjes su 'byung ngo snyam du myi sems so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pan
232a8('bum): rjes su 'brab po snyam du myi sems so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// bsam gtan gyi
232b1('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin te/ ci yang nus pa myed
232b2('bum): pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing gsog ste/ smyig rgyu lta bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams
232b3('bum): cad rang bzhin gis stong pa lags na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
232b4('bum): la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dpa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes
232b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dpyod pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'angargya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
232b6('bum): pa rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du kye ma 'jig rtend gnas pa 'di ni/ sems phyi nad ci log tu gyur pa ste/
232b7('bum): de dag ni thabs la myi mkhas pas 'khor ba nas yongs su gdond par myi nus kyis/ ma la bdag gis sems can de dag gi don tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// tshul khrims
232b8('bum): kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la dakhyad par bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ya 'khyad par bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dpyad par bya'o// bsamo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
233a1('bum): pa sa spyad par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o snyam nas/ de sems can de dag gi don tu phyi nang gi dngos po rnams yongs su gtong ste/ de yongs
233a2('bum): su gtong ba'i che/ 'di snyam ste/ bdag gis gang yang yongs su gtang ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po 'di dag ni bdag nyid 'jig pa'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor dang
233a3('bum): ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de sems can de dag nyid kyi dond tu tshul khrims ngan pa'i
233a4('bum): skabs myi 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di sngar de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bla na myed pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la/
233a5('bum): thog gcod pa byed pa dang / ma byin par yin pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun gyi tshig sma dang / bra ma can du 'gyur ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig
233a6('bum): smra ba dang / tshig kyas ba can du 'gyur ba dang / chags sems can du 'gyur ba dang / gnod sems su byed pa dang sog mas bya ban tu 'gyur ba / lus sa spyod dang / rlon
233a7('bum): pa dang / tshangs par smond pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar smond pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar smond pa 'di ni/ bdag sa tshul dang myi 'dra'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub
233a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims kyi pha ro sad tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du tshig rtsub pa dang / brlang bas rtag tu spyos shing brgyas kyang 'jug pa'i mam/
233b1('bum): spyad do/ dathug pa dang / 'angs dang / mtshan gyis btab ci bstan pa dang / sras kyi yan lag gshegs sa dang / sa la kyang ngag sams kyi srid du/
233b2('bum): dba'i phyir zhe na/ 'di skar de ni ska thams cad sgra brgyan sa bur yongs su rtog go// gzugs thams cad dbu ba lta bur yongs su rtog go/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chu bams
233b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// de sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ le lo'i sems
233b4('bum): myi skyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ mtho ris su skye ba yang se lo can du rnyed pa dar dka' na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
233b5('bum): chub sa ci smos kyis/ de bas na bdag kas nam thu na myang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogapar sangs rgyas kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsam par byar
233b6('bum): rtag tu brtson pa myi 'dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// de mas
233b7('bum): tsas de dag nyid kyi don du sems kyi 'khrugs pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan du skye ba yang sems 'khrugs pas rnyed par
233b8('bum): dka' na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci spos kyis/ de bas na bdag gis nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
234a1('bum): ma sangasas pa byung thasems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa ni bsas ga/ dag pa rol na du sa rgyu
234a2('bum): na mams can dang / nyid kyidon tu margan byung ba ma da na pa pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar gyun pa yang gas rab dang thas par gyi bu tshu
234a3('bum): lan 'dis par ni 'di snyam num pa/ zhes rab kyi pha rom da tu phyid pa sa ma zhugs par rnam pa gzhan gyis sems can yongs su skyed par bya bar myi nus kyis/ re bas na bdag gis shes
234a4('bum): rab 'chal pa dang lnga nad pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par myi bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor da de ltar yongs su rto// ka pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/
234a5('bum): sems can rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom lda na 'das gal te pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la tha dad pa ma
234a6('bum): mchis na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ji skad du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga'i rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/ dam pa zhes bgyi/ phul zhes bgyi/ gya nom
234a7('bum): pa zhes bgyi/ bla na myed pa zhes bgyi/ gong na myed pa zhes bkyi/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
234a8('bum): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la ni/ rnam pa tha dad pa gang yang myed/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed na ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa
234b1('bum): po 'di dag gis kyang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying 'thob par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brten na/ pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag gis kyang pha rold tu phyinang
234b2('bum): pa'i mying 'thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ lus rnam par tha dad pa rnams ni ro'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du phyin na/ kha dog gcig du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dang
234b3('bum): bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtend na yang / pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
234b4('bum): pa nyid du phyin na 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye// nad pa nyid kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur te/ 2di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni tshul
234b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi phasad tu phyin pa'o// 'dri ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
234b6('bum): phyird pa'o// 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed pas de'i phyir khyad par myed do//
234b7('bum): gsosad pa bcom ldan 'das de sna chos gangs yang khyung po ma mchisaD+h+we thAg ma la tshas na/ sa su 'thob par 'gyur ba jig pazhig mchis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
234b8('bum): ni ci'i slad du/ pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po de dag gi rab ces bgyi/ gtso bo zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/ dam pa zhes bgyi/ pul zhes bgyi/ bya nom pa zhes bgyi/ bla na myed pa zhes
235a1('bum): bgyi/ gong na myed pa zhes bgyi/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba lar pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de
235a2('bum): bzhin te/ don rjes su thob par bya ba la/ chos gang la yang bye brag dang khyad par myed de/ 'ond kyang 'jig rtend ki tha snyad dang brdar bya na/ sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su gdon du
235a3('bum): pa'i do rang tu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind
235a4('bum): pa yang yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod do// sems can de dag la yang skye ba myed do//
235a5('bum): 'chi ba myed do/ 'pho ba myed do// 'byung ba myed de sem sa can myed pas/ chos thams cad myed par rig par bya // rab 'byor nga rnam grangs des mi shes rab tu
235a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ pha ro sad tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag gi rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ pus zhes bya/ grwa nom pa zhes bya blu na myed pa
235a7('bum): zhes bya/ kong na myed pa zhes bya/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu gleng gi bud myed gang ji snyed pa de dag
235a8('bum): gi nang na bud myed rin po che ni rab ces bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ kong na myed pa zhes bya/ mnyam
235b1('bum): ba myed pa zhes bya/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa rab ces bgyi ba dang / gtso bo zhes
235b2('bum): ba dang mchog ces bgyi ba dang / dam pa zhes bgyi ba dang / phul zhes bgyi ba dang / gya nom pa zhes bkye ba dang / bla na myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / gong na myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / mnyam
235b3('bum): ba myed pa zhes bkye ba dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba de cisas dgongs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
235b4('bum): tu phyind pa 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung zhing myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir/
235b5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa'am/ gtong ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la dpa
235b6('bum): rab 'byor de de ni ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa'am/ gtong ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos
235b7('bum): thams cad yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / btang ba myed pa'i phyir ro// gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chos thams cad myi 'dzin myi
235b8('bum): gtong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba med pa/ rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab
236a1('bum): tu sbyin ma mam ba yongs sa kyi 'dzind myi gtong // rab 'byor zhes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pan/ 'du shes yangs sa
236a2('bum): byo gas k+Shi ba snod tu byo ldan dag pa ba'i ming tu phyid payongs sa kyi 'dzin kyi
236a3('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sna yod/ sa kyi 'dzin myi gtong / rab 'byor du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni waM yongs su myi 'dzin kyi
236a4('bum): ngango // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ yid
236a5('bum): sa su 'dzin myigatong // rab 'byor kyi pha rol tu phyin par gas yongs sa kyi 'dzi byasarab 'byor dgas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
236a6('bum): yangs su kyi 'dzin kyi / rab 'gyur / ba kyi pa ro la tu phyid pa ni/ stongasas kyi 'dzin myi / ba 'byor dgas rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pan mas sa
236a7('bum): kya mas kyi ya khyen / ga sangasas kyi kyi'abyo gas sa kyid sa
236b1('bum): 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rna ba'i rnam
236b2('bum): par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
236b3('bum): pa ni sde'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzi nad myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi
236b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i srid kyirnam pa shes yongs bya/ gas tu phyin pan ga kyi ga pa sangs su
236b5('bum): rab 'byor dgas rab kyi rolang tu phyi pa/ na pa'i 'dus rag pa mongs su myi 'dzin nga / ra'agyur gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
236b6('bum): pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i yongs su myi 'dzi nang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor dashes rab kyi
236b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo //
236b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba
237a1('bum): tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
237a2('bum): phyind pa ni sde'i 'dus te reg pa las zung ba'i tshor ba yongs su gyi 'dzi nad kyi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su kyi 'dzin
237a3('bum): myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sa'i khams la
237a4('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ chu'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ mye'i khams
237a5('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rlung gi khams yongs su myi 'dzin dmyig tong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni nam mkha'i
237a6('bum): khams yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa ni ma rig pa
237a7('bum): yongs su kyi 'dzind kyi gti / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzind kyi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin
237a8('bum): myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ mying dang gzugs yongs su myi 'dzi dang myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa ni/ skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzin gyi gtong rje
237b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ reg pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo / shes rab kyi pha rol
237b2('bum): tu phyind pa ni sred pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni// len pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ srid pa
237b3('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni skye ba yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ rga shi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo //
237b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/
237b5('bum): pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha
237b6('bum): royang du phyinang pa mi brtso 'grus kyi pha mang tu phyin pa yongs su kyi 'dzinan kyi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi 'os dAn phyid du pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin
237b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ gres rab kyi pha rol du du phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzind TI rjeshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nang stong ba nyid yongs su
237b8('bum): 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ni/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin
238a1('bum): kyi gtong / nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ chen po
238a2('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ni 'dus
238a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyin pa ni/
238a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi 'dzin myi gtong / do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ni/ thog ma nga tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gto
238a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes ra ba kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
238a6('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi
238a7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin gyi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind kyi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
238a8('bum): pa ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol/
238b1('bum): rolang tu phyin pa ni/ dngos po myed pa ba ba nyid stong pa nyid yongs su kyi 'dzin gyi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin gyi
238b2('bum): gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su mya
238b3('bum): 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ dbang po lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ stobs lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myig
238b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo / shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
238b5('bum): lag brgyad pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ 'phags pa'i ba/ den pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab
238b6('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab
238b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su myi
238b8('bum): 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
239a1('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mngon par shes/
239a2('bum): pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin gyi gtong ngo po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ ting pe 'dzin rnam yongs kyi dzin gyi rta ga shes kyi chongs phyin nig dungs kyi sgornamapasas su kyi na gyi shes bya
239a3('bum): byin dang shin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha
239a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa ni sa so yang dag par rig pa zhi yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni snying rje chen po yongs su myi 'dzin kyi
239a5('bum): gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni
239a6('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol
239a7('bum): tu phyin pa ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin gyi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi
239a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang byang chub yongs kyi 'dzin phyi ga te'o/ rab 'byor dashes sa kyi ma ros tu phyid nis byed pa gro/ kye tshu byi kyig sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang
239b1('bum): ran tshong pa yangs sa pa bzungs btang ba lags/ ngi sa 'dugs yongs sum bzungs btang ba lags/ jis du 'du byed yongs sum bzungs btang bas /
239b2('bum): spyan rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig yongs su ma bzungs btang ba lags/ ji ltar nan pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba sags/ ji skar da
239b3('bum): yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji skar na yid yongs su la bzung sa
239b4('bum): btang ba lags ji ltar na gzugs yongs su ma zung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sgra yongs su ma pa zung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na dri yongs su ma bzung
239b5('bum): ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na khri sangs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltam reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar ni chom yongs su ma bcu
239b6('bum): ma btang ba lags/ d+hi sbyar na myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na/
239b7('bum): gA'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzungs btang ba lags/ sa ran kyi'i rnam par shes pa yongs sum bzungs btang ba lan sum kyirnas pa gas pa yongs sum bzung
239b8('bum): btang pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung sa btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar marna ba'i dris
240a1('bum): te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btung ba lags ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung
240a2('bum): btang @de lta dasus kyi 'dus te ga pa yongs sum bzungs bta lags ltar na sri kyi 'dus te kA pa yongs su bzu sa btang ba lags/ mis na rgya
240a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji lta ma narna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na snga'i 'dus /
240a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis chorab yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lus
240a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i/ rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
240a6('bum): ji ltar na sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na chu'i khams yongs su sa bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar ni m+bu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
240a7('bum): ji ltar na rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su
240a8('bum): ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su
240b1('bum): ma btang ba lakas/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ba lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang /
240b2('bum): ba lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sred pa yongs su la bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na le nad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
240b3('bum): ji ltar na srid pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji sbyar na skye ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar nag shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha
240b4('bum): ro la tu phyind pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma bcu ngam btang ba lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu
240b5('bum): phyind pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltaran batshor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
240b6('bum): phyind pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba
240b7('bum): lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma
240b8('bum): bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa
241a1('bum): nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs
241a2('bum): su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na// thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
241a3('bum): ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
241a4('bum): yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na myi myigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma
241a5('bum): btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs/ su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
241a6('bum): ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs
241a7('bum): su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dbang po lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar stobs lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag
241a8('bum): bdun yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung
241b1('bum): ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags ji ltar na chad myed pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na gzugs
241b2('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani yongs su ma bzung / ma btang ba lags/ ji skar na rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su ma bzungs btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mthar kyis gnas
241b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su ma bzung ma /
241b4('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams yodas su ma bzung ma btang ba lakas/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzi nad rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
241b5('bum): ji snyar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzungabatang ba lags/ ji sa rang bzhin gshegs pa mnabs bcu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/
241b6('bum): dkyi 'jigs pa bani yongs su ma bzungs btang ba lags/ ji sbyar nasaso yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung
241b7('bum): ma btang ba lags/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang
241b8('bum): lags/ ji sam na lan cig phyim 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma 'thungs btang ba lags/ ji ltar na phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma gzungs btang ba lags
242a1('bum): ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs
242a2('bum): su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yid la kyi
242a3('bum): byed pas/ gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ nor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ 'du shes yongs su
242a4('bum): ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// 'du byed yid la myi byed pa sa 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// nam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ rnam par shes pa yong
242a5('bum): su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// myig yid la myi byed pa sa myig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// na ba yid la myi byed pas/ rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang
242a6('bum): ba yin no// sna myid la myi byed pas/ sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// lce yid la myi byed pas/ sre yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// yid yid la myi byed pas yid yongs
242a7('bum): sram bzung ba bting ba yin no// gzugs med sa myi byed pas/ gzunas yongs sum bzungs bta ba yin na/ mengs kyi mngam sum 'a ma tsha ma
242a8('bum): dri yid la gyi byed pas/ dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// re yid la myi byed pas/ ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// reg yid la myi byed pas/ reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang
242b1('bum): pa yin no/ chos yid sa myi byed pas/ chom yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// rtsig gi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma/
242b2('bum): btang ba yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ sna'i rnam par/
242b3('bum): shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ sde'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung la btang ba yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la
242b4('bum): kyi byed pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yi pas myi byed pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs
242b5('bum): su ma bzungs btang ba yin no// kyig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ byig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzungs btang ba yin no// rna ba'i 'dus
242b6('bum): te reg pa yid la gyi byed pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma

249a4('bum): bsam gtan gigyi pha rol tu phyind pa yid la myi bgyi/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi bgyi// nang dang pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid yid la myob
249a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa
249a6('bum): nyid yid la myi bkyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ mthal las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ thog pa dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dor ba myed pa stong
249a7('bum): masangs kyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs ma rnams pa sa ngas nyid snyengs myed kyi/ gas
249a8('bum): nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yid sa myi bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
249b1('bum): pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ rdzu 'phrus kyi rkang pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ dbang po lnga yid la myi bgyi/ stobs lnga yid la myi bgyi/ byang chub kyi
249b2('bum): yan sag bdun yid la myi bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la myi bgyi// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ bsam gtan bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ 6
249b3('bum): byed pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ gzugs skyed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la myi bgyi/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
249b4('bum): dgu yid la myi bgyi/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyi da dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yid la myi bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams yid la myi bgyi/
249b5('bum): tIng nge 'dzin rnams yid la myi bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la myi bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la myi bkyi/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi
249b6('bum): yid la myi bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la myi bgyi/ snying rje chen po yid la myi bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la myi bgyi// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i/
249b7('bum): 'bras bu yid la myi bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi bkye/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ rang byang chub yid la myi
249b8('bum): bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la myi bgyi na 'o na bcom ldan 'das gzugs yid la ma bgyis/ tshor ba yid la ma bgyis
250a1('bum): 'du shes yid la ma bgyis/ 'du byed yid la ma bgyis/ rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis// / myig yid la ma bgyis/ rna ba yid la ma bgyis/ sna yid la ma bgyis
250a2('bum): lce yid la ma bgyis/ lus yid la ma bgyis/ yid yid la ma bgyis// gzugs yid la ma bgyis/ sgra yid la ma bgyis/ dri yid la ma bgyis/ ro yid la ma bgyis/ reg yid
250a3('bum): la ma bgyis/ chos yid la ma bgyis// myig gi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ lce'i
250a4('bum): rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ lus kyi rnam pa ra shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yi nga la ma bgyis// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la
250a5('bum): ma bgyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ lce'i 'dus teg pa yid la ma bgyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid
250a6('bum): la ma bgyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid la ma
250a7('bum): bgyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgya nad kyis tshor ba yid
250a8('bum): la ma bgyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis// sa'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ chu'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ mye'i khams yid la ma bgyis
250b1('bum): rlung gi khams yid la ma bgyis/ nam mkha'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la ma bgyis/ ma rig pa yid la ma bgyis/ 'du byed yid la ma bgyis/
250b2('bum): rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/ mying dang gzugs yid la ma bgyis/ skye mched drug yid la ma bgyis/ reg pa yid la ma bgyis/ tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/ sred pa
250b3('bum): yid la ma bgyis/ lend pa yid la ma bgyis/ srid pa yid la ma bgyis/ skye ba yid la ma bgyis/ ga yid la ma bgyis// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yid/
250b4('bum): la ma bgyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yid la ma bgyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sa ngas ma bgyis/ the con 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
250b5('bum): pa yid la ma bgyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yid la ma bgyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yid la ma bgyis// nang stong pa nyid yid la
250b6('bum): ma bgyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ don dam pa/
250b7('bum): stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis// thog
250b8('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid
251a1('bum): sa ma bgyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ ngo bo nyid/
251a2('bum): stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid
251a3('bum): la ma bgyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ dbang po lnga yid la ma bgyis/ stobs lnga yid la ma bgyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la ma bgyis/ 'phags
251a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la ma bgyis/ 'phag/ sa pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ bsam gtan bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ tshad myed pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis
251a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la ma ba gyis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yid la ma bgyis/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku yid
251a6('bum): sa ma bgyis/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yid la ma bgyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yid la ma bgyis/ ting nge 'dzin
251a7('bum): rnams yid la ma bgyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma bgyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la ma bgyis/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ so so yang
251a8('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ snying rje chen po yid la ma bgyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la ma bgyis rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis/

251b2('bum): pa shes pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la ma bgyis par dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par ma 'phel na
251b3('bum): yang ji ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su ma rdzogs na yang / ji sar rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur// bcom
251b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' phal pa/ rab 'byor nga nas gzu/ kas yid la myi byed/ tshor ba yid la myi byed/ 'du sa des yid la myi byed/ 'du byed yid la myi byed/ rnam par
251b5('bum): shes pa yid la myi byed// myig yid la myi byed/ rna ba yi nga la myi byed/ sna yid la myi byed/ lce yid la myi byed/ lu sa yid la myi byed/ yid yid la myi byed// gzugs
251b6('bum): myi byed/ sA yings kyi byed/ rdzi yid la myi byed/ ro yid la myi byed/ reg yid la gyi byed/ chos yid la myi byed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yin
251b7('bum): la myi byed/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed// myig gi 'dus
251b8('bum): te reg pa yid la myi byedarna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pa yid kyi
252a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg
252a2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
252a3('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ sa'i khams yid la myi byed/ chu'i khams yid la myi byed/ mye'i khams yid la myi byed/ rlung gi khams yid la myi byed/ nam mkha'i khams yid la myi byed
252a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la myi byed/ ma rig pa yi de la myi byed/ 'du byed yid la myi byed/ rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ mying dang gzugs yid la myi byed/ skye mched
252a5('bum): drug yidas kyi byed/ reg pa yid la myi byed/ tshor ba ma dal gyi byed/ med pa yid la myi byed/ ma nad pa yid la myi byed/ srid pa yid la myi byed/ skye ba yid la myi byed
252a6('bum): shi yid su myi byed// sbyin pa'i pha rol du tu phyinang pa song la myi byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yid sa myi byed/ bamed pa'i pha ro mang tu phyinang pa yid su myi byed/ brtsor 'grus kyi ma rlom
252a7('bum): tu phyind pa yid sa myi byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yid la myi byed/ shesu rab kyi pha rosod tu phyid pa yid la myi byed// nang stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ phyi stong pa nyid med la myi
252a8('bum): byed/ phyi nang stob pa nyid yongs myi byed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ chen pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la myi byer
252b1('bum): 'dus sa byas stong sa kyad mengs kyi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med la rgya byed/ thog sa dag ma byed pa gang pa nyid medas myi byed/ do bskyed pa stong pa nyid yings myi byed/ rang bzhin
252b2('bum): stong pa nyid mings kyi byed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi sa myi byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa myi byed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod sa myi byeng / dngom po myed pa stong pa da
252b3('bum): yid la myi byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la
252b4('bum): kyi byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ 8dang po lnga yid la myi byed/ stobs lnga yid la myi byed/ nga chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa
252b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la myi bkye// 'phag sa pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ bsam gtan na yid la myi byed/ tshad myed pa bzhi yid la myi byed
252b6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani yid la myi byed/ rnam par thadad pa brgyad yid la mi byed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la myi byed/ rnam par thar pa la
252b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa yid la myi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams yid la myi byed/ ting nge 'dzind rnams yid la myi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la myi byed
252b8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la myi byed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ snying rje chen po yid la myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma la
253a1('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la myi byed/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la myi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi byed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la myi byed/
253a2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yid la myi byed/ rang byang chub yid la myi byed/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la myi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
253a3('bum): ba'i cha ba rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs
253a4('bum): pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yid la ma byas/ tshor ba yid la ma byas/ 'du shes yid la ma

253a7('bum): par shes pa yid la ma byas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid las
253a8('bum): byas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas/ lce'i 'dus te reg

253b7('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa yid sa ma byas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yid sa ma byas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yid sa ma byas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa
